I especially like the automatic open/close feature, specifically when getting in and out of my car.  What was even better was the great customer customer service! I had a minor issue after having dropped it. I contacted Amazon for an exchange however at the time I couldn't proceed with an even exchange because the item was slightly higher priced on their site. Luckily I found the card that came with the umbrella and contacted them directly. (I hadn't realized that i should have called them instead of Amazon).  I spoke to Joe and he took care of me immediately.  This was one of the most seamless experiences and I can't be more happy. It was a fantastic buy and I highly recommend this product - not only for the good quality but also for its great customer service.

Name: Super fast delivery
Author: Big & Kind
Review Text: Super fast delivery...great communication. Haven't had a chance to use yet, but it's very sturdily built. I will point out one thing. Most of the comments all say that it opens AND closes with the push of a button. It opens quickly, but you must manually close it. Not a problem to be honest, just wanted to mention it.Can't wait to use it!

Name: Compact and sturdy
Author: Grace
Review Text: Love that it is compact and it definitely fits in tote bags like advertised. I have yet to test it out in the rain but the material seems to be good quality and the handle and hardware are very sturdy. No more fighting with the umbrella when you're trying to close it as the button on the handle pops the umbrella closed! Overall, I am very happy with my purchase!

Name: A fantastic umbrella with even better customer support.
Author: LoneGeek
Review Text: A great, compact umbrella. It's small when folded but is plenty big for one person. I've only ever used Totes and am glad I decided to try something better. My umbrella arrived with a defective canopy panel but the company made it right immediately. They responded to my email within hours and I had my replacement umbrella two days later. A quality product is a good thing, but responsive customer support is worth much more these days.

Name: Better than Apt. 5
Author: Brandon
Review Text: The best umbrella I've ever owned. I'm a pedestrian commuter and this umbrella stands up to any weather (though large gusts do tend to make it bow a bit, which of course it does). I'm actually buying a second one because it's previous iteration was mistakenly or intentionally stolen at a bar.

Name: Great and helpful product
Author: Brett Henry
Review Text: Great and helpful product.  Mine broke in a couple of months and I contacted the vendor.  There were kind and sent a replacement for free.  Would recommend this product and supplier

Name: don't waste you money.
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: not very big and does not appear to be very well made. The Teflon did not last a week. It has rained here everyday for a weekl

Name: Best umbrella around
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Quality umbrella for a great price. Not too big, not too small. I really like the easy quick open and quick close feature. It arrived the day after I ordered it and just in time for a rain storm within one day. Like the name says, it sure does repel the water! Shake it off and it dries fairly fast. Nice compact size when closed.....less than a foot long. I am beyond pleased.

Name: Recommend.  =)
Author: Karlene Schmidt
Review Text: This is a GREAT umbrella.  Just keep in mind it IS a travel umbrella, so it's smaller than I actually would've liked.  Does fit in my hobo bag purse perfectly however.  Haven't gotten into wind it wouldn't hold up to yet.  LOVE the open/close button, too.

Name: Great umbrella
Author: Charity B
Review Text: Purchased this umbrella a few months ago for work travel, I've used it multiple times during summer rain storms and it has been very reliable. It's a little heavier than other umbrellas but the compact size makes it easy to carry and travel with.

Name: Work well, a little heavy
Author: pokey
Review Text: They work pretty well, but are a little heavy for carrying.  Size is suitable and easy to open and close.

Name: I like it!
Author: Liza Jane
Review Text: My new umbrella arrived today, on schedule.  It seems to be very sturdy.  It pops open very quickly.  Be sure to have it away from your face.  It closes easily.  It isn't raining, so I cannot comment on its function.  It does seem to be of good quality, and should last.

Name: Awesome umbrella
Author: G. Greene
Review Text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Needed a new umbrella to carry with me at all times to and from work. This fits perfectly in my bag and opens wide enough to protect me from any showers on my walk to the train. I think I will get an extra one for my Mom. The build is very top quality.

Name: Repel Umbrella holds up!
Author: Jon S
Review Text: I‰Ûªve had this umbrella for about a year and I live in the Northeast. It has held up very well and has never turned inside out despite some nasty winds and heavy downpours. Mechanism works just as well as it did the first time.

Name: Quick First Impression
Author: Shamshu Shahid Raja Mohamed
Review Text: I ordered this product a few days ago and it arrived last night. Below is my first impression of the product:- It came in a nice and simple package, with a small paper describing the material of the umbrella and instructions on how to use it- It looks sturdy and durable- The button to open and close the umbrella operates well- Overall, it has a simple and nice look to it, while having the feeling of a sturdy and durable umbrella.I will update the review after getting to use the umbrella more

Name: Windproof umbrella is useful, but heavy
Author: K. HOWE
Review Text: This umbrella truly is windproof.  It is great to have the option to close and open with the touch of a button.  One negative is that it is quite heavy, but that is also why it stands up to the rainy and windy days so well.

Name: Great Little Umbrella
Author: TheCasualFriday
Review Text: I've had this umbrella for several months now and Not had any problems. I really appreciate the open/shut automatic button on and it's so far been sturdy during heavier rain and wind.

Name: Small, but durable.
Author: Greg
Review Text: I've had this long going chain of umbrellas I buy from CVS. Generally I buy one, it breaks, I return it for a refund, then the next time there's a storm I buy one again when heading for the metro. I decided to shell out a little and get this baby, and so far it's worked wonders. It's a bit smaller, so it won't save you from sidewind, but it has a permanent place in my travel backpack.

Name: A Sturdy Umbrella That's Easy To Carry
Author: TWD913
Review Text: This umbrella opens very quickly. It's also easy to fold, pack and transport. The Teflon coating is a nice touch. And most importantly,  the fiberglass spokes provide durability in the wind. I liked it so much that I also bought one for my wife.

Name: Try this umbrella, was a flash sale!
Author: M. T.
Review Text: Came OVERNIGHT, the fastest I've ever gotten anything!! On top of which the umbrella is superb, very strong spring but rather that than something that won't last or will break!

Name: Good umbrella. The snap out feature is very nice
Author: Desseler
Review Text: Good umbrella. The snap out feature is very nice, but I wish the cover material was more waterproof. I'm always worried to bring this umbrella around on a rainy day because all the water sticks to the material.

Name: Nice Umbrella
Author: Adwoa Gyaa D.
Review Text: I haven't had the chance to use it yet, but I opened it and it seems like  a nice umbrella. I lost my totes i had for years and so I had to find something that was comparable. I hope this does just as well.

Name: A great backpack-(or large purse / small luggage)-sized umbrella
Author: Alexander J. Wilson
Review Text: A great backpack-(or large purse / small luggage)-sized umbrella. Very sturdy. If Repel can find a way to make a pocket-sized pill model that cuts off another 2-3 inches, yet is able to maintain this level of construction quality, I will buy it instantly.

Name: I love how it is automatic
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: woah woah..I love how it is automatic. Before I bought this umbrella, I bought a cheap $10 umbrella at a local grocery store, and it was not automatic and broke after one day of use.... So after examining the reviews of this umbrella I decided to order it. I'm so surprised by the sturdiness and the good quality of this umbrella! The automatic feature definitely helps me a lot, and I feel like a new person with this umbrella. For the price, I cannot complain.

Name: Solid, small, durable umbrella
Author: any_mouse
Review Text: These five stars are a bit of a lie as I haven't actually used the umbrella in the rain yet, but I have opened it up and checked it out. As far as I can tell, this is a fine umbrella. It seems worth its value and I do not regret purchasing it in the slightest. I shall update if my experience turns out to be anything less than five stars, though I don't except it will be based on my impressions.

Name: After looking through MANY options, this umbrella was the ...
Author: ARB
Review Text: After looking through MANY options, this umbrella was the one that topped the list. When it arrived (promptly) we soon realized that it lived up to all of the positive reviews. High quality, reasonable cost, and sold by a company that cares about their customers. We made the right choice!

Name: So good I bought it twice
Author: MJT
Review Text: I bought one of these for my wife. It survived a rain storm in Harrogate, Yorkshire, UK, whilst I had to fold my umbrella up and so I bought this for myself. Brilliant full function travel umbrella!

Name: So far so good. Real strong deployment and rapid auto collapse
Author: Donald
Review Text: So far so good. Real strong deployment and rapid auto collapse.  Feels real sturdy.EDIT 1:  Won't deploy fully.  Gets stuck 3/4 of the way up and needs help.  Once fully extended it won't lock so the wind partially opens and closes.  Not happy that this is the first real day I'm using it and its having these issues.

Name: Excellent!
Author: John N
Review Text: There are cheaper ones out there and my gal has gone through quite a few. I got her this one for a few bucks more and we were both impressed. She's been using it quite a bit now and loves it. Years ago we got the Davek brand for traveling which are very nice but also very expensive. Wish we had found these first. Great quality for the money."Edit 9/7/16". The rainy season is on now in South Florida and my gal has been giving hers a real work out and keeps raving about it. I just got another one for myself. I've just read some of the negative reviews on this product & had a good laugh. Some of them are just plain stupid. And "No" I didn't get a freebie or a discount for writing a review. Never have & never will.

Name: Great gift for Christmas!
Author: BAX
Review Text: When I received the umbrella seems to be built well and comes with a lifetime warranty!  I am giving it as a Christmas gift so can't give anymore info.. Good price!

Name: Good quality. Performs as designed.
Author: Robert
Review Text: Used all over SE Asia. Small enough that I carry strapped to the bottom of my messenger bag. Durable enough to withstand decent wind gusts. The one button open and close hasn't broken yet. It is small so, it won't keep you completely dry, but that it is the trade off of having a portable umbrella.

Name: Not easy to close.
Author: 808 Dreaming
Review Text: Thank goodness Amazon offers free returns on this. This umbrella opens just fine but is incredibly difficult to close. The button has to be pushed very hard (hurt my finger) to get it to close. I actually thought maybe it was broken and wasn't going to close because I pushed it and it did nothing. I just wasn't pushing hard enough.  After it "auto closes", you still need to get it to compress into the handle. This also requires a lot of strength to push both ends towards each other - and I'm not a weak person. I really enjoyed it popping back out multiple times because it didn't click fully into place even though it was right against the handle (sarcasm).  I don't care if it withstands high winds and lasts a lifetime. I don't want to have to close it ever again.

Name: These are the absolute BEST umbrellas you can buy
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: These are the absolute BEST umbrellas you can buy. It is not the cheapest, but I will never go back to a standard umbrella. Living in Chicago, having a sturdy, portable, and reliable umbrella is a necessity, and this is everything you can ask for, and then some! The automatic open/close feature is amazing, it's truly like magic and very helpful when carrying anything. I would recommend this product to anyone!

Name: Nice umbrella.
Author: Diana Peretti
Review Text: Fun umbrella.  Sturdy.  Button open and closure (but then you have to push it down/click it into place.)  EXCELLENT customer service.  My friend bought one and recommended it to me.  I recommend this umbrella :)

Name: Five Stars
Author: Island Mermaid
Review Text: This a sturdy compact umbrella. Some are so flimsy. Not this one!

Name: Umbrella has a sturdy feel and worked great even in high wind at ...
Author: Nicole M. Steinmetz
Review Text: Umbrella has a sturdy feel and worked great even in high wind at first. I did have a problem about 6 months after purchase with it not collapsing or locking into the open position. Since it had a warranty I contacted Upper Echelon and received a reply within a few hours and they replaced the faulty umbrella with no hassle. Will update with higher rating if new umbrella remains trouble free. Customer Service gets 5 stars from me though.

Name: Made my wife proud.
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: I purchased two of these umbrellas and they are arrived on-time and in perfect condition. I was amazed at how easily they open and close and so were my wife and daughter. My wife had bought another umbrella just a couple weeks ago which she immediately returned to the store. She is very proud of her new Repel. I can't comment on how long these will last as I just got them but the build quality looks great. Hopefully they'll provide long service and if anything goes wrong I'll just use the lifetime warranty to get a replacement. Sounds like a great deal all around. Cheers!

Name: Very Well Made Umbrella.
Author: Nikki Now
Review Text: I was very impressed with this umbrella. It seems like good quality and it is very sturdy. So far so good. It didn't collapse in a strong wind.  I like the life time warranty. So many umbrella I've had could not withstand the strong wind & rain storms of So. Florida. I would definitely recommend this umbrella.

Name: It feels like one of those 30$ umbrellas that we have in ...
Author: Roy
Review Text: It feels like one of those 30$ umbrellas that we have in the Philippines but when you give it a good pull... you start to appreciate and get a little frustrated that you can't  cause it to go inside out which is really good.I like the material and am hoping to try this in the rain and against the wind someday.The product came in exactly as it was advertised here. :-)

Name: Compact, sturdy, ready for a whirlwind!
Author: Erv Crain
Review Text: We needed a compact but sturdy umbrella to pack in our travel bag that required one-hand operation extending and retracting.  Undoubtedly, this is the best travel umbrella we've ever owned.  The Repel is fantastic!

Name: The first time I went to use this and opened ...
Author: Stefanie Staley
Review Text: The first time I went to use this and opened it, it was broken.  When open, the umbrella doesn't fully extend and click into place.  It moves when opened all the way, which is ridiculous b/c of the wind blowing it all over.  I would suggest everyone open theirs immediately upon receiving rather than wait for the first time you need to use it.

Name: Good open and keeps you dry
Author: happymama
Review Text: Good open and keeps you dry, but kind of hard to close all the way.Update-The company reached out to me and sent me a replacement umbrella, which closes a little better. I like the umbrella and the customer service.

Name: Well worth the price.
Author: Raymond
Review Text: Excellent umbrella. Holds up well in the wind. I like the fact that it opens and closes with the push of a button. I've bought two.

Name: I immediately thought to purchase it again as it was perfect. Light weight
Author: Santo Zheng
Review Text: This is the second time I purchased it. The first being about 6 months ago. When I found out that I lost my old one, I immediately thought to purchase it again as it was perfect. Light weight, yet sturdy and convenient. I didn't regret it the first time and I have a feeling I won't regret it the second either

Name: Definitely not windproof!
Author: Lucy
Review Text: So disappointed! I bought this umbrella hoping that it would be strong, sturdy and durable. However, after using it ONCE, I can tell it is not. Like many cheap umbrellas, the plastic handle is not firmly glued, and so it wiggles. As a result, as the wind blows, the umbrella sways side to side. It is hard to hold and requires a lot of effort.

Name: Quality!
Author: Chad
Review Text: My favorite umbrella. Took some strong, strong winds and never even thought about breaking. Nice size too. Very portable, sturdy build, ever the string handle tie is well built.

Name: ... light in my hands even though the handle is pretty well-built and designed
Author: W1nt3rF3ll
Review Text: The Repel Umbrella feels light in my hands even though the handle is pretty well-built and designed. The buttons allows convenient opening/closing of umbrella with a simple click, which in turn allows me to board/alight a vehicle easily. Once closed, the umbrella unfolds itself neatly without much hassle. I have yet to find out whether it is indeed windproof, but I think it's fair to say it's reasonably wind resistant.

Name: Well built
Author: D
Review Text: Really sturdy and well built. Doesn't really keep me as dry as my other umbrella. For some reason it feels like a kid size. If you're a smaller person then it'll be fine for you. Taller or bigger not so good. It does dry quick which is great. Fits in my backpack for school and takes up little space.

Name: Great umbrella for the price
Author: J. Durso
Review Text: Arrived in excellent condition. Got a chance to use it as it rained the very next day. Although the wind was only blowing at around 15 mph, the umbrella performed well. I'm confident it will hold up well in stronger winds. Very well built product.

Name: Great product so far
Author: David R
Review Text: Great product so far. I was definitely excited to use it after being caught without an umbrella for far too long. I was pleasantly surprised by the warranty. The owners of the company are very passionate about what they do and proactively reach out to customers - making this purchase all the sweeter knowing I am buying from a small business and buying something that has passion behind it, despite being something as simple as an umbrella.

Name: Most sturdily built umbrella I have ever owned...
Author: Mary
Review Text: Purchased two Repel Windproof Travel Umbrellas...they are perfect!!! Very sturdily made and function like a dream. Have not had the chance to test the windproof capabilities yet but from the way the units are built I believe that will withstand any winds that I might venture out into. Worth every penny...

Name: and sturdy. This little guy is the perfect companion for ...
Author: Jordan G
Review Text: Compact, sleek, durable, and sturdy. This little guy is the perfect companion for a backpack, car, or duffle bag in case you get caught in the rain. The definitive swoosh of its automatic extending is oddly satisfying.

Name: Great umbrella, sturdy
Author: Jasper Peak Pilates
Review Text: Ordered the Repel Windproof travel umbrella for a trip to Alaska. In the meantime, it has been raining in Colorado so I was able to use it. Great umbrella, sturdy, well made. Looking forward to using it for many years to come.

Name: Umbrella ribs are mostly fragile plastic and thin wire which is fine until it breaks
Author: Mike
Review Text: First time out and it broke.  Umbrella ribs are mostly fragile plastic and thin wire which is fine until it breaks.Updated: Upper Echelon Products contacted me and arranged a hassle free refund of the product. While it doesn't change my experience w/ the product its nice to see a company stand by their product and make things right.

Name: very happy
Author: Jim B.
Review Text: Only used it once.  So far it's quite study, the action is smooth as it opens and closes well.  Teflon make's it easy to shake off the water.  I'm happy with the purchase, it's great value for the money

Name: Needs improvement
Author: FaithHopeandLove
Review Text: Love the idea behind it, but first time using when it was raining and a little windy, it bent some of the wiring. Maybe needs to be a little tougher.

Name: Not worth it!
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Very disappointed! This umbrella has been used 3 times, and the ribs are bent and it will no longer automatically close. It was used on sunny days, for shade. It was not windy at all. What a waste of money!

Name: Great Folding Umbrella
Author: MT
Review Text: I haven't had a chance to try this in the rain yet, but it appears to be the best folding umbrella I've ever seen.  It is very sturdy, and the umbrella area was much larger than I was expecting.  The only downside is that it is heavier than I would like for a travel umbrella.  I guess  sturdiness comes at a price.  My previous travel umbrella (which was very light and folded up more compactly) broke the third time I used it.  I am looking forward to trying this one out on my next trip.

Name: Excellent customer service!
Author: Jo O.
Review Text: This umbrella lasted almost a year before it finally broke during a particularly windy rainstorm. The metal shaft was bent to the point that the umbrella could not be closed anymore. Customer service was excellent and replaced the umbrella immediately when I contacted them to express my disappointment over the windproof abilities of the umbrella. That said, it is a sturdy enough umbrella to withstand most storms, such that I am happy to repurchase this product when I need another umbrella!

Name: Very satisfied with this product
Author: Skaliwag
Review Text: I've had mine for a few months now, and in rainy Hilo Hawaii, cheap umbrellas just don't last.  This one is reasonable in price, but definitely not "cheap" in construction.  It is well made and has a very slippery-feeling feel.  Very satisfied with this product.

Name: Very Effective
Author: Philip A. Hayes
Review Text: I love this umbrella.  It is well made and functions perfectly.  I bought it anticipating wet weather on a trip to the Pacific North West, and it was so intimidating, the rain didn't bother to show up.  Heading to Southern California now to see if it will also cause the sun to take cover behind a cloud.

Name: I bought it after borrowing a friends and I have to say - I really like this umbrella
Author: Tova
Review Text: I have bought perhaps 15 umbrellas since college and this is my most recent find. I bought it after borrowing a friends and I have to say - I really like this umbrella. It opens quickly and repels water really well. Relatively sturdy and dries off quickly too! It's a sturdy investment! I hope it lasts a long time!!

Name: Look no further, this is your umbrella!
Author: Jennifer Summers
Review Text: I never gave much thought to buying a good umbrella before.  I would pick up a Totes umbrella at. Cash register and be done with it.  Boy, have I been mistaken about that choice! This Repel umbrella is of a quality that is unmatched in any of my old Totes umbrellas.  This could be the last brand of umbrella I will ever buy!

Name: Five Stars
Author: Satisfied buyer
Review Text: I've only used the umbrella once, but it seems to do everything that it is supposed to.This is an update. I have since ordered two more umbrellas because I was very impressed with the little amount of time it took this umbrella to dry. In addition, the automatic open/close feature works very well.

Name: Dry
Author: Bungholio
Review Text: This is a great compact umbrella. Does not feel flimsy and is easy to open and close. It should last a long time and is needed in my rainy climate.

Name: Repel travel umbrella is perfect
Author: Diane Dobish
Review Text: Love the Repel windproof, auto-open travel umbrella. It's compact and lightweight and has kept me dry during intense Florida rain storms. Thanks to the  vendor for the excellent service.

Name: Great umbrella!
Author: Zoe
Review Text: After breaking 3 other umbrellas, I have bought this one and it works very well! Has put up a good fight against heavy rain and 20 mph winds. It turned inside out a few times due to the wind but snaps back to normal. I also like how easily it opens and closes with the push of a button.

Name: Great for multiple people!
Author: Allyson
Review Text: It was raining while I was out with my friends. We managed to fit five girls under this umbrella. Great product and the company, itself has amazing customer service. I received an email making sure that I received the product, that it works, and to remind me that this product has a lifetime warranty.

Name: My daughter is delighted with how it works and that it feels strong
Author: Chuck of Ohio
Review Text: Was delivered on time. My daughter is delighted with how it works and that it feels strong.  It will be a day or two until she needs it, but she is looking forward to see how the rain and wind are handled. I may be buying a second one for myself. :-)))

Name: It rains a lot here so a years' time will tell just how good it will hold up
Author: Charles Greenwell
Review Text: I haven't gotten to actually use it in the rain yet. I did open and close it several times and it did do that very well. It rains a lot here so a years' timewill tell just how good it will hold up.

Name: This is the umbrella you want.
Author: MisterDMU
Review Text: High quality, sturdy umbrella.  My last umbrella got obliterated by a strong gust of wind.  Just by holding this one, I can tell that will never happen.  It's solidly made, feels premium, and (importantly) keeps the rain out.  Excellent product!

Name: Easy to carry and afforded great protection on my recent
Author: Kindle Customer
Review Text: Easy to carry and afforded great protection on my recent, rainy vacation. Several people commented on how much coverage it gave, given its small folded up size. While there was some wind, the umbrella wasn't really tested by it. It seems sturdy, dried quickly enough and both unfolded and folded quickly and easily. Good travel companion.

Name: Durable & Practical
Author: NB
Review Text: The umbrella seems well made and opens/closes easily. The handle is soft and yet heavy duty. I haven't used it in the rain yet, but it certainly seems as described online.

Name: Great purchase
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Arrived in perfect condition and the automatic open and close work using one hand. Came with instructions showing and explaining how to use it and provides email for customer support should you have any issues or questions.  Havent had any rain yet to try it out but it looks sturdy.So far I'm happy with purchase. Would give 5 stars but didnt have rain to really test it.

Name: Best umbrella
Author: Jonathan Wilner
Review Text: The is the best umbrella I've ever owned.  It's pretty small, but that's what I wanted.  It hasn't flipped inside out even in strong winds.  It dries quickly and opens and closes easily

Name: Three Stars
Author: gigi3636
Review Text: Nice travel umbrella, but a little too small for me.  But if you're one for small, light, and easy to carry umbrellas, this is the one for you.  Very nicely constructed and sturdy looking. Great customer support staff.

Name: Love this umbrella
Author: NitaGrace
Review Text: Love this umbrella! I used it on my recent trip to Europe where it rained for half of my vacation but I stayed nice and dry. The water just runs off of it so when you're done using it, it's not soaking wet. Great item!

Name: The umbrellas wore out to quickly. I live in ...
Author: Ismael Lopez
Review Text: The umbrellas wore out to quickly. I live in a rainy place and after 2 or 3 months of use, the metal started rusting and eventually broke making the umbrella unusable. These are more for emergency use and not daily use.

Name: I am impressed that it seems sturdy; it is compact
Author: Jeff
Review Text: Repel Windproof Travel Umbrella with Teflon CoatingI have not yet had a chance to use this product.  However, I am impressed that it seems sturdy; it is compact, and, it has a button that opens the umbrella and a button that closes the umbrella - how good is that :) . This umbrella provides good coverage while balancing size and weight. We are taking our two Repel umbrellas on a trip and we will get a chance to confirm our perceptions.

Name: ... rain so I finally decided to invest in a good umbrella and I am so glad i chose this ...
Author: Tikola Russell
Review Text: New York was having very strong winds and tons of rain so I finally decided to invest in a good umbrella and I am so glad i chose this one. It was sturdy, it did not flip, and of course it kept me dry. I would recommend to others and I would purchase it again.

Name: Like the size and the functionality
Author: jdpb
Review Text: Like the size and the functionality, but disappointed to see rust starting to appear on my first trip with it.

Name: Happy with purchase!
Author: Deb A.
Review Text: Umbrella arrived in perfect condition and it opens and closes perfectly. Haven't had a chance to test it in rainy, windy weather yet, but it appears to be well made and very sturdy. I'm certain it will keep me dry this winter.

Name: Very solid and heavy
Author: Anonymous
Review Text: I wanted an umbrella for commuting by train. This one is very solid and heavy - I can't add any more weight to my bag.

Name: Great umbrella at a low price.
Author: Rchristo
Review Text: Opens in a fraction of a second.  Great replacement policy.  Actually has springs on each rib.  Also closes quickly.  Price does not reflect the quality of the construction.  I would definitely recommend this umbrella.

Name: Quality Build, Light weight and Good price!
Author: Venkat Gururajan
Review Text: Pleasantly surprised with the design and build, Small enough to carry in your backpack and weighs light. High-quality portable umbrella built to lost longer than regular totes sold at leading resellers! Reasonably priced and fast shipping. Highly recommended.

Name: and sturdy. The only complaint I have is that the ...
Author: LeeDockOclock
Review Text: I'm always a fan of products that do what they are supposed to do. This umbrella came exactly as described and has performed perfectly so far. Lightweight, portable, functional, and sturdy. The only complaint I have is that the handle and support rod in the middle are slightly loose and wiggle if you rotate from the base. BUT this does not in anyway effect the stability or overall function of the umbrella, which really the only thing I care about. A+

Name: Really perfect for travel
Author: Tyler Conlin
Review Text: Bought this to use it on a trip to Disney World. It was small enough that we could carry it in a backpack and keep it with us in the parks in the event that it rained. After the trip I wound up putting it in my car to use when needed. The compact size really makes this umbrella great.

Name: Tiny travel umbrella
Author: Joe Arquilla
Review Text: This is exactly what I was looking for my long train commute into downtown. Unpredictable Texas weather will no longer catch me unexpectedly and have me soaked head to toe. This is tiny, light durable and fits in my backpack. Top notch purchase.

Name: Buy This!!!
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: This is the best umbrella ever made!!! Don't hesitate...purchase it and be just as pleased as I am. The product is super strong. I was able to test it in a heavy rainstorm and it performed as promised.

Name: Worked upon initial receipt. Second attempt the umbrella failed/broke. Do not buy
Author: Aquemini
Review Text: I bought this umbrella. Opened it once in the house to test it out. Stuck it in my backpack for times when it might rain walking to and from the bus stop. It was over a month before I actually needed to use it for rain protection and the button does not work to extend or withdraw the canopy. Ridiculous. I would not recommend this product.

Name: Great Umbrella
Author: KarenW
Review Text: Great umbrella.  Opens in a snap and closes just as easily.  Protected us from rain.  Have not had an opportunity to test it in the wind.  Dried out very quickly after use.  Handle is quite comfortable.  Fairly lightweight and less than 12" long which makes it a very good travel umbrella.

Name: Very strong
Author: Elizabeth M. Mornini
Review Text: I bought this umbrella based on reviews of other purchasers. It‰Ûªs very good quality for its small size. I‰Ûªve had many sub-standard umbrellas previous to this one and this one far outdoes others from the past.

Name: Working great so far.
Author: Lori T
Review Text: I just bought this umbrella for a trip to Japan. I used it yesterday and it worked great. The rain came pouring down and the umbrella held up well. I haven't tested the wind proof nature of it yet and hopefully won't have to.

Name: Small and easy to open / close.
Author: JFD3
Review Text: Compact, easy opening and closing.  Seems well constructed.  Fits in my brief case.  Coverage by the canopy seems adequate although it has not been tested in the wind and rain yet.

Name: Very sturdy and nice
Author: Krramnik
Review Text: Very sturdy and nice . Wish they make it more broader.Con: Not big enough. Below the hip , i am still getting wet when it is raining with a lot of wind.

Name: Faulty Strap Broke
Author: Derek B
Review Text: Strap broke after less than a month of use. 2 Stars because everything else seems to be very high quality, but without a strap this umbrella is unappealing to me now.UPDATE - THEY MADE IT RIGHT AND SENT ME A NEW UMBRELLA. CHANGED TO 4 STARS

Name: Very Sturdy
Author: LRS
Review Text: Very sturdy.  Arrived on time in perfect condition. Although I haven't had any rain yet to test it out, it has solid mechanics and seems very sturdy.  it is a tad bit heavier than other umbrellas I have owned, but that is because they are cheaply made.  I really like the rubber-type grip on handle.

Name: but it is pretty awesome that with a click of a button I ...
Author: JT
Review Text: I haven't gotten a chance to use the umbrella yet so I can't comment on the durability on a windy/rainy day, but it is pretty awesome that with a click of a button I can open and close it!  I'll comment when we get a rainy day!

Name: So far so good with these really well-built umbrellas
Author: kath
Review Text: So far so good with these really well-built umbrellas... I've only had them for a short time so I haven't even had an opportunity to use them in the rain, but they, again, appear quite substantial and sturdy.

Name: good value small unbrella
Author: william j kennedy
Review Text: the day i got this umbrella i used it on a windy rainy day.  the umbrella worked well and did not turn inside out like i cheap one did.  this unbrella was worth the money and paid for itself the day i got it.

Name: I liked how small the umbrella is and how it fits ...
Author: MsZ
Review Text: I liked how small the umbrella is and how it fits in my purse. Unfortunately I haven't had the opportunity to use it yet. However when I do I will do an update review if that't okay with you

Name: Dissapointing
Author: Felipe de la Rivera
Review Text: It were disappointing. I had high expectations in its durability and sturdiness, but after a season of use (4-5 uses) it looks loose and some times doesn't open properly. I don't think it will survive another season. I don't recommend this product.

Name: Excellent service from the company and a great product at ...
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: I recently purchased the Repel Windproof travel Umbrella.  The Umbrella did live up to my expectations.  I used it on a very windy and stormy day and the quality of the materials held up very well.  Excellent service from the company and a great product at a good price!

Name: In Case of Rain
Author: M.
Review Text: Really good "in case of rain" umbrella.  If it's already raining, grab your "its raining sideways" umbrella.

Name: It's thicker and slightly bulkier than other similar style umbrellas ...
Author: JC
Review Text: It's thicker and slightly bulkier than other similar style umbrellas I've had in the past, so it's more noticeable when I have it in the side pocket of my bag.Some of the stitching around one of the arms was unraveled in the unit I received, which makes me worry about how long this umbrella will hold up.  If shipping and handling already gives it signs of wear, I wonder how it'll hold up to the vicious winds in NYC.If it keeps up it's claim of being practically indestructible I'd consider it worth it despite the gripes I have.  Only time will tell.

Name: smart and convenient open and close mechanism
Author: Yi Long Roy Ong
Review Text: worked as advertised, smart and convenient open and close mechanism. did not break but build quality not as good as expected. a little wobbly when opened

Name: The new one seems to work better because it doesn't require as much force to close ...
Author: herchui
Review Text: I bought this umbrella about two years ago. It worked well until few days ago when one of the spines broke at the joint. Upper Echelon Products said they'll warrant the umbrella for life and they mean it. Within two days they sent me a replacement, no questions asked, and no need for me to return the broken one. The new one seems to work better because it doesn't require as much force to close it. Very satisfied with their service.

Name: I really like the umbrella and it is very sturdy but it ...
Author: Corey
Review Text: I really like the umbrella and it is very sturdy but it takes forever to get the cover back on it! I just don't see why that can't be easier.  Other than that, it's great.

Name: This is a very good quality umbrella
Author: Lizka
Review Text: This is a very good quality umbrella. Also, if you are an assassin, this will come in handy. Once you press the release button, I sincerely hope that there's nobody standing in front of you because you'll have a lawsuit on your hands. This thing pops out like the speed of a bullet. Watch out!

Name: The umbrella is very well made and plenty sturdy to offer support in windy conditions
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: The umbrella is very well made and plenty sturdy to offer support in windy conditions, yet it's small enough to fit in a traditional back pack.One of the best things about this company is the customer support. They are amazing! It's a small company that is willing to do whatever is necessary to make sure that the customer is satisfied with the purchase. Not all companies operate with such care as that!!

Name: So far so good, though
Author: Doug Brown
Review Text: I have only used this this umbrella twice so far, so it's a bit early in the game to give a real in depth review.  So far so good, though, as the opening/closing mechanism works just fine and the construction appears to be of good quality.  At 6'6"/250 I probably should have looked for something a little bigger, but this is certainly workable for me.

Name: Solid product; poor customer service
Author: Mark R. Weksler
Review Text: This umbrella snapped and we have been waiting 12 days for a response. It was a nice product when it was working but this customer service (or lack there of) is mightily disappointing.

Name: Works as advertised.
Author: Busterwolf3
Review Text: Bought one for my girlfriend a couple months back, since then she's used it multiple times and had nothing but good things to say. I went ahead and got one for myself and so far it works as advertised. Water literally just rolls off this thing.

Name: Much better than the typical compact umbrella
Author: pooj
Review Text: Much better than the typical compact umbrella.  This one is very sturdy and extremely waterproof.  Also easier than most to get back to folded and stowed.

Name: the buttons to automatically open and close it work great! You have to push the close button just ...
Author: Angelia A. Young
Review Text: I haven't had an opportunity to use it yet but, the buttons to automatically open and close it work great! You have to push the close button just a tad bit harder than the open, but that's no biggie at all.  I hope it's as waterproof as touted.. But so far, it works beautifully!

Name: Held up really well during Floridas heavy late summer rain ...
Author: Troy W
Review Text: Held up really well during Floridas heavy late summer rain storms. Could be a tad bigger but given its compact size, it's a fair trade off.

Name: I expected much better quality for the price range of this umbrella
Author: Matt Smith
Review Text: We used this lightly and all of the rivets rusted and two of the fiberglass extenders have broken.  I expected much better quality for the price range of this umbrella.

Name: As far as umbrellas go, this is the Cadillac ...
Author: Andy
Review Text: As far as umbrellas go, this is the Cadillac. I walked for miles in Himeji during the middle of a monsoon and even though it turned inside out a few times, none of the arms ever broke and it continues to work perfectly. 10/10 would umbrella again.

Name: Good, but had some challenges
Author: Bob Krygowski
Review Text: Good umbrella.  I had a few problems with it in the wind, and it didn‰Ûªt let that long.  I‰Ûªm giving it another try to make sure it wasn‰Ûªt me who broke it or it just could t handle the wind.  It also got harder to keep closed and would open after some light jostling in my bag.

Name: All advertised features work very well, my only complaint ...
Author: Kevin
Review Text: All advertised features work very well, my only complaint is that it can be a bit difficult to return the umbrella to the "locked" position because the spring is relatively taut.

Name: Great product. I like the way that the "open" ...
Author: Gregory A. Engel
Review Text: Great product.  I like the way that the "open" button also works to close the umbrella.  Very handy feature.

Name: BEST umbrella I have ever owned
Author: Michael Kinney
Review Text: BEST umbrella I have ever owned!!!!! I have gone through way too many umbrellas and finally found one that works! I need a good working umbrella during the crazy summer rains in Florida and this one handles the job just great!

Name: Outstanding Craftsmanship, Usability, and Price!
Author: J. Kim
Review Text: Love the craftsmanship and the Teflon to deflect off 99% of the rain.  I hope they upgrade the design on the grip, though...personally, I'd prefer it to be all black without the red highlights.

Name: Great little umbrella.
Author: Bonnie  AZ
Review Text: Love these umbrellas.  Even my son, who has lived in Portland for 22 years without an umbrella, was impressed enough to take one home with him.

Name: You'll stay dry
Author: The Chad
Review Text: This one is small (around 36 in. I believe). Opens and closes well. I felt like I buy 1 or 2 umbrellas a year. The lifetime warranty on this convinces me that I won't have to buy any more.

Name: Started rusting!
Author: Carlie Long
Review Text: I love to convince, however mine started to rust..... within two weeks of having it. It should be able to get wet and not rust! It's an umbrella!

Name: Looks to be sturdy and well-make
Author: Joseph C. Nowlin
Review Text: I've had it up and down twice, but no in the rain yet. Looks to be sturdy and well-make. I love it.

Name: Just What I Wanted
Author: Patrick J.
Review Text: The umbrella just came today so I haven't had a chance to really use it, but, it is the perfect size-packable, a sturdy feel, great mechanical operations opening and closing...Just what I wanted and I'm pretty confident that I'll get really good use of it...May add to this after I've gone into storm duty with it!

Name: I love how quickly and easily they opened and closed
Author: Neda Leppard
Review Text: I ordered two umbrellas, one for the car and one to keep in my suitcase when traveling. Just received them today and although I haven't had an opportunity to use them in the rain, I did try them out. I love how quickly and easily they opened and closed. They're a pretty good size, not too big, and I was really happy to see how sturdy they were and how solid they felt in my hand in the open position. I feel confident they'll rise to the occasion and keep me dry when need be!

Name: Seems like a well built, lightweight umbrella
Author: texasvixen
Review Text: Bought this for an upcoming trip to Italy. Read it can be rainy this time of year so wanted to be prepared. This umbrella is lightweight. I'm putting it in my carryon along with my laptop and other miscellaneous items we need while on a 10+ hour journey. It seems to be a good, well built umbrella and doesn't weigh a ton. Hopefully, it won't rain, but if it does, I'll be ready.

Name: Well made.
Author: Foonie
Review Text: I have not needed to use this umbrella yet. But I love the way it opens and closes with the push of a button.  Perfect for what I need it for.  It seems very sturdy. I got this for walking to work because I'm tired of all my other umbrellas turning inside out on me.  The delivery time was excellent too.

Name: and the second one works great. Good umbrella
Author: Paul C.
Review Text: The plastic cap on top, broke off after the second use.  The company replaced it, without any issues,and the second one works great.  Good umbrella, great service.

Name: Opens and closes easily and is very compact
Author: Susan Simpson
Review Text: This umbrella works very well.  Opens and closes easily and is very compact.  Fits in my son's backpack perfectly.

Name: Recommended.
Author: Bo Jaillie
Review Text: As advertised, reasonably priced and on time. The umbrella seems to function well and is robust in construction at first glance. Given the lifetime replacement guarantee, I don't see how you could go wrong with this purchase. Recommended.

Name: Push open button is cool though.
Author: David G
Review Text: Bought it for a trip to Oregon. It can not hold up to the wind and rain at the coast. Push open button is cool though.

Name: Broken in one wind storm
Author: KR
Review Text: Broken in one windy rain storm.

Name: Good quality for the size and price
Author: LB
Review Text: Bought a couple of these for a trip to Central America and was not disappointed. The umbrella is well made, sturdy, and a nice size for travel. The only complaint is that they were heavier than expected - probably because of the materials used, so not complaining since they work really well. Definitely holding up better than cheaper alternatives. So far, so good!

Name: Great Umbrella
Author: Art
Review Text: This umbrella is very well constructed, is easy to open and to close. Its closed size makes it easy to have available anywhere. It is one of my best umbrellas.

Name: The strength of this umbrella surprised me! Don't be ...
Author: Tobias Wong
Review Text: The strength of this umbrella surprised me!Don't be fooled by it's size.It's durable, compact, and stylish with it's minimalistic/black and red color-way.Using it in both NYC and Seattle where it rains EVERY FREAKIN' DAY.

Name: and it was an awesome umbrella. It seemed sturdy and durable and was ...
Author: Elizabeth Bradbury
Review Text: I ordered this umbrella in 2016, and it was an awesome umbrella. It seemed sturdy and durable and was still very portable. However, recently the umbrella broke and just stopped opening, which was a huge disappointment as I loved this umbrella. Luckily it comes with a lifetime warranty. I messaged the seller and they have immediately shipped me a free replacement. That alone is worth 5 stars!

Name: Love It!
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: 92 degrees today and dry, so I haven't had a chance to try my new umbrella.  But I did check it out - inside the house, no less!  It is extremely well constructed and strong, and the mechanism to open and close worked beautifully and smoothly.  I expect to enjoy it for a long time.  It is everything promised.  Thank you!

Name: Do not recommend and false advertisement
Author: seila heng
Review Text: Do not believe the reviews.  I took this umbrella to Paris, France and it did not survive the weather there.  It was windy one day, and the umbrella turned inside out and eventually broke one of the metal pieces.  Do not recommend and false advertisement.

Name: My favorite umbrella I've ever owned
Author: Wendy Anders
Review Text: My favorite umbrella I've ever owned. I've now purchased 3 of them...for my husband and son, as well as myself. None of them have blown inside out in a strong wind, and none of the ribs have broken or collapsed. I've been using mine for over a year...love it!

Name: Best Umbrella Ever
Author: M. Sabree
Review Text: Best umbrella ever.  Purchased for a gift it was well received and appreciated.  They're still talking about it.  Actually saw thie product on Good Morning America.

Name: Immensely suitable
Author: Michele Astle
Review Text: The umbrella is effective and easily manageable.  One of the reasons I bought this umbrella  was to have an umbrella suitable to any occasion.  I consider this umbrella a success.

Name: Very happy with this umbrella.
Author: Kylees mom
Review Text: I returned another umbrella and bought this one.  I really love it.  It has been completely wind proof to downtown Milwaukee winds.  Hasn't turned inside out at all.  Others claimed they were windproof but a slight breeze turned them inside-out.  I carry it with me to/from my car every day.

Name: Great umbrella!
Author: T. A. Long
Review Text: Received my umbrella just in time for the deluge coming tomorrow night. Well made, just the right size to cover you, yet small enough to fold up and fit into its sleeve. All for a fair price. Couldn't ask for more.

Name: because I am horrible about checking the weather
Author: Chris Bellucci
Review Text: so far I have only used this once, but it did what it was made to do...  Kept me mostly dry, and opened and closed in a snap.It is small and fairly lightweight, so I keep it in my bag at all time, because I am horrible about checking the weather...

Name: I‰Ûªm sure it‰Ûªs a nice product, but it‰Ûªs much heavier than I expected ...
Author: Rose
Review Text: I‰Ûªm sure it‰Ûªs a nice product, but it‰Ûªs much heavier than I expected and is going to add weight for travel.

Name: Excellent umbrella
Author: John
Review Text: This is an especially useful umbrella when getting into or out of a car in heavy rain due to the automatic open/close feature. It is now a regular part of my briefcase. It proved so useful, I bought more and keep one in each car.

Name: Strong and durable
Author: Ruthie P
Review Text: Ordered for my granddaughter in college. Went thru 2 cheaper ones on windy days.  This one holds up in wind and rain.

Name: Five Stars
Author: S. H.
Review Text: This is a birthday gift so it hasn‰Ûªt been opened yet.  The recipient used the umbrella last weekend and really liked it.  It was windy and it didn‰Ûªt turn inside out.

Name: Love this Umbrella!
Author: Bradley Phares
Review Text: So far, so good! I haven't had to use it in high winds yet, but the umbrella seems to be made of really great quality!

Name: a very good and portable umbrella
Author: B. K. Whittaker
Review Text: So far, a very good and portable umbrella. The vendor is also very proactive in letting you know that you can get a replacement if it breaks.

Name: Great service
Author: Topolino
Review Text: Very easy to use and as sturdy as any folding umbrella I've used. Nice to have the retract function..

Name: One of the best umbrellas I've bought
Author: Michael A.
Review Text: One of the best umbrellas I've bought. It's very tough and it has the ability to close with the touch of a button so you don't have to struggle closing it. Very strong material and has held up in Chicago storms very well.

Name: Great umbrella
Author: Janet Thibodeau
Review Text: Great umbrella.  Having had many small umbrellas that have fallen apart before, I can definitely say that this one feels very durable and well made.  Automatic opening works very smooth as well.

Name: Really liked it ...
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: I have this product for a couple of months and I have to say it is great! The folded size is quite small and it fits everywhere. I love the fact that it gets dried very soon after I open it inside my room, less than hour ...Definitely recommended.

Name: This appears to be an outstanding umbrella. As it ...
Author: Jay Lieberman
Review Text: This appears to be an outstanding umbrella.  As it has not rained since I bought it, I am going by looks and design.  They were purchased (2) to be carried as a travel item.

Name: NICE !
Author: tasso taylor
Review Text: Wife luvs it! Now she doesn't make a mess when she is shopping in the rain! Some businesses run out of umbrella bags, now she don't have to worry about it! Thanks!

Name: Well made.
Author: R. Darter
Review Text: Due to our local weathermans inability to even look out the window. Living in Southern California in the "winter" or "rainy season". I find it quite useful to keep a small umbrella in my vehicle. The cheap throw-a ways I kept there in the past would generally die after one or two uses. This one seems to be very well made, and I have high hopes for many years of use.

Name: Haven't tested it yet but seems sturdy. The only problem it is kind of difficult ...
Author: Petr Muntyan
Review Text: Haven't tested it yet but seems sturdy. The only problem it is kind of difficult to put the umbrella back in the bag after opening it.Update. So far this lil guy stood up against 3 major rains and held his ground perfectly.

Name: If you need a compact umbrella, here you go.
Author: Zach Flaschner
Review Text: Never actually bought my own umbrella before so this was a first. Comparing it to ones I have used in the past, it is a bit smaller, and lighter. Honestly had my doubts with it in the beginning because I had a few problems opening it with the button. But it ended up working great and has no issues in windy weather as well.

Name: Held up in windy rain.
Author: Grammy
Review Text: I've only used the umbrella a few times, but it seemed to hold up well in a windy rain we had a few month back.  As I use it more, I will go back and update my review accordingly.

Name: Five Stars
Author: IT Guy
Review Text: Great umbrella. Functions as its suppose to.Would recommend this Umbrella to friends and family.

Name: Raindrops wont be falling on my head
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Shipping was almost immediate. But the kicker for me is the warranty...lifetime warranty is almost obsolete these days and I was pleasantly surprised that it was offered for this product. Haven't had to use it yet but have opened and closed it (outside of course) and it has a smooth action. Looks to be made of high quality. If your in the market for a new umbrella...I definately recommend this one. Stay dry my friends!

Name: Ingenious mechanism
Author: Overstreet
Review Text: I too am amazed at the ingenious mechanism that extends the umbrella and also folds it using only one button. I was sceptical but it works as advertised.

Name: Pretty disappointed. We were opening the umbrella to use ...
Author: erasoup
Review Text: Pretty disappointed. We were opening the umbrella to use for the first time and noticed a huge hole in one of the seams. Not the quality I was expecting for the price I paid. Unfortunately it was completely useless. The seller said they would issue a refund but never did. Would not recommend.

Name: Superior to any umbrella I've used
Author: Mybusiness
Review Text: Superior to any umbrella I've used. No false claims and great quality to this item.  Would order again and do recommend it.

Name: Good "windproof" umbrella
Author: Nick G
Review Text: Excellent umbrella. I've used it in some fairly heavy storms and while it did flip inside out a couple times, there was no bending or damage to the umbrella like the last one I had.

Name: High-quality, solid performer
Author: Glenn R. Miller
Review Text: Packaged nicely and delivered on time, sturdy high-quality construction. Pushing the open button results in a solid, quick opening. Easy to close and wrap it up to store it again, too.

Name: Great Umbrella in the Wind !
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Really awesome umbrella!  I am always skeptical of umbrella durability but I live in Florida where we get storms just about every day.  This umbrella is easy to open and close and is extremely durable in the wind.  I would recommend this umbrella to anyone who needs a durable option to a store bought umbrella.

Name: Light and tough umbrella
Author: Loren
Review Text: small and tough.

Name: Five Stars
Author: C. Callahan
Review Text: Light, strong, and really sheds water. Definitely not large enough to share.

Name: Good little umbrella!
Author: bboamx
Review Text: Just what I need for carrying an umbrella back and forth to the office.  Briefcase size, and it goes up or down very easily.  Not bad.

Name: Touchy Switch, But Worth It
Author: Justin Ammerman
Review Text: Worth the premium for the extra reinforcement and coating.One thing to note is that I've accidentally misfired the automatic close while naturally holding the umbrella once it's open. If there were to be a redesign, I'd suggest moving away from a toggle button if at all possible. That's a minor complaint, though. The product is more than worth it.

Name: Great umbrella
Author: Marivi Monver
Review Text: It‰Ûªs an umbrella. It does what it‰Ûªs supposed to do. I like the flexibility feature

Name: Nifty umbrella
Author: LindaY
Review Text: Pretty nifty umbrella, the way it pops open and closed.  Time will tell if this umbrella can withstand all this opening and closing.  The lifetime guarantee sure helps!  The umbrella is a good size -- not so small that it's flimsy and not so big that it's unwieldy.  Bought it for my son who is heading off to college.

Name: Nice, compact, and sturdy umbrella
Author: D. J.
Review Text: Nice, compact umbrella. Easy to open and close. Great for travel. Very sturdy.

Name: Five Stars
Author: munsoro
Review Text: Have used once in rain with heavy wind gusts with no problems!

Name: Looks good!
Author: D. Franklin
Review Text: I've only had this for 3 days and have not had an opportunity to use it yet, but it appears to be of good quality and easy to use. The fact that there's a lifetime warranty is a plus - if it doesn't hold up, I should be able to receive another that will!

Name: but it was received on time and looks good appears to function well
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Have not used it yet so cannot comment on function.  but it was received on time and looks good appears to function well.

Name: Fine Umbrella
Author: Juan Baltazar
Review Text: Small and portable! The umbrella pops up and down at the push of the button. Holds up great in the wind. The material that its made of prevents it from soaking the area you leave it to dry. Main things is that its very portable, you can leave it in the car. You never know this Texas weather.

Name: Good quality product
Author: Arnell
Review Text: Good quality product.  This is very compact, well as compact as it can get for it's size, and well-built.  I would recommend.

Name: Simple and easy
Author: Mesmiro
Review Text: An awesome umbrella! Most of the water just falls off when you shake it. Closing and putting it away is so simple and easy. I would recommend this product.

Name: Excellent umbrella
Author: dajazz
Review Text: I‰Ûªve never looked forward to rain....then I bought this umbrella. Sure the rain still stinks, but knowing you‰Ûªve got a great umbrella gives a lot of peace of mind

Name: Simple, functional, somewhat self-drying
Author: Anubhab Haldar
Review Text: This thing is great. A button click flicks it open. The same button collapses it. The collapse is a fairly fast jerking motion, which helps dry the umbrella (smart). Good product overall. Definitely would recommend. Simple, no hassle, as happy as one can be with an umbrella purchase.

Name: The only umbrella that has lasted me longer than a ...
Author: Perry
Review Text: The only umbrella that has lasted me longer than a few months.  2 years and going strong!  Very hard to close (or maybe I'm just weak).

Name: Not great
Author: Eugene Oden
Review Text: Worked alright with light use but the closing action is unreliable, often requiring a bit of muscle to stow.  The handle loop is too small and just broke when I tried to get my hand into it on a wet windy morning.Edit: Garbage.  Handle fell apart while I was trying to close it, which had become a chore due to the failed retraction mechanism.

Name: and had a great test under heavy wind conditions just the other day
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: It's light, compact, and had a great test under heavy wind conditions just the other day.

Name: An ‰÷â•ü with a tear
Author: Chris K.
Review Text: Received this with a slight tear. Too small to be worth sending back, but still a little disappointing. Otherwise this is OK; functions as described and it seems sturdily constructed.

Name: so good. It keeps the water off and hasn't folded ...
Author: HavnFun
Review Text: So far, so good. It keeps the water off and hasn't folded in windy weather. The opening and closing features are a plus!

Name: This umbrella is surprisingly durable. I haven't had it ...
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: This umbrella is surprisingly durable. I haven't had it flip inside out so so far it holds true to it's name. And it's compact too!

Name: Nice coverage. Haven't had a storm yet
Author: JS
Review Text: Need to replace my travel umbrella - this one worked exactly as expected. Nice coverage. Haven't had a storm yet, but mild rain and it worked great.

Name: Nice Umbrella
Author: mom44
Review Text: Nice well made umbrella. Handle is easy to hold. Haven't had a chance to use it during heavy wind conditions but works great in regular rain.

Name: Broke after being dropped from below waist
Author: Patrick
Review Text: The first time I used this umbrella, I was carrying it by the handle and it slipped out of my hand from below my waist.  The plastic piece at the top broke in half when it hit the ground.  It was not a long or particularly hard drop, and I certainly didn't expect the amount of damage that occurred.  Clearly the materials that this umbrella is made of are sub par.

Name: ... ones it is a little bit more heavier and like 8 dollars more expensive
Author: Jenny
Review Text: Compare with my old ones it is a little bit more heavier and like 8 dollars more expensive. But it is very good with windy weather and good size for your bag.

Name: Looks great, haven't used it yet.
Author: Brooke Cooley
Review Text: Bought this for our office staff to use when they have to step out on rainy days.  I haven't used it yet,  but it looks great on the umbrella stand by the door

Name: thank you for this wonderful product
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: This umbrella saved my life countless of times. Even thought i had it for only 3 days, i have been using my brothers for work. These are tough as a bull, No matter how hard the wind blows this umbrella does not bend nor flip. I will definitely invest more in the future. thank you for this wonderful product

Name: Nice portable umbrella
Author: HD Rider
Review Text: Very compact and high quality. It dries quickly and opens and closes like magic.

Name: (impossible for my kids of 10 and 11) I like the look
Author: diochon
Review Text: After 10 minutes under steady rain, the umbrella started to leak. I live in a city where it's raining everyday few months in the year so I'm concerned by this purchase.It's very difficult to close the umbrella, specially when it's wet...(impossible for my kids of 10 and 11)I like the look, the size but the fact that it's leaking is very disappointing.

Name: This is not a product I would recommend
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: I didn't bother bringing this to Italy with me as when I saw it it was clear to me that it would not be keeping rain off of me as it is simply too small. I would recommend a good rain jacket rather than a travel umbrella.

Name: perfect!
Author: Bryan Hoang
Review Text: The water doesn't wick off as quickly as I thought when I shake it while indoors. Other than that, perfect!

Name: So I can‰Ûªt evaluate how good it will be
Author: Dianne
Review Text: Product was as described. Haven‰Ûªt used it in a wind/rain storm yet. So I can‰Ûªt evaluate how good it will be.

Name: Works very well. Just needs some getting used to ...
Author: Christi
Review Text: Works very well.  Just needs some getting used to.  It's so automatic!

Name: Works very well
Author: Nvh
Review Text: Like the umbrella, works very well. I just wish I could find a shorter more flat for handbag.

Name: Works well, but closed hard.
Author: Gary L. Beal
Review Text: The umbrella is well constructed and uses excellent materials.  I like the way it double folds when it closes; it takes up less room.  However, when closing it, it is very hard to get it to "catch" so that it stays closed.  I am unable to do it with one hard, or by pushing one end of the umbrella against my leg or body.  It takes two hands to close, and that is somewhat inconvenient.  It takes the edge off an otherwise excellent product.

Name: Love it! Fits right where I want it in ...
Author: Terry R
Review Text: Love it! Fits right where I want it in the niche next to the seat in my van. I'm looking forward to using it the next time I'm caught in a downpour.

Name: Looks good!
Author: mweerth
Review Text: Actually, it is to be a gift so I don't really know.... But it looks good and was delivered on time!

Name: Sometimes feels like I'm fighting it
Author: Eston Melton
Review Text: Snappy to open. Sometimes feels like I'm fighting it, or like pieces are grinding unhealthily, when I try to squeeze it. Has stood up to a few days' rain and I hope it withstands many more years of use.

Name: Really nice umbrella
Author: Charlie B Vermont
Review Text: Updated: Sadly, left my Repel on a bus...  And bought another one!  Seriously, they're great.Love it!  Strong, small, fairly light.  Does the trick for me.

Name: I love this umbrella
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: I love this umbrella.  It is small enough to fit in my purse.  It opens and closes very easily.  The structure is sturdy and it held up on a particularly windy day.  Very easy to fit back into the case.

Name: Nice, sturdy umbrella
Author: LTB510
Review Text: Works very well and seems sturdy for a compact umbrella.  I expect this one will last me much longer than other compact umbrellas I've purchased at this price though.

Name: Perfect compact umbrella!
Author: raindrop1978
Review Text: Well-made and very compact umbrella with simple one-touch button for opening and closing. I ordered two and one was defective. I contacted the seller and they replaced it right away.

Name: Broke after only a few uses.
Author: Margaret M.
Review Text: I wouldn't buy this again.  Nothing as described.

Name: This umbrella is small and love the additional shade it provides due to its double ...
Author: Jeff S.
Review Text: This umbrella is small and love the additional shade it provides due to its double ply shade layer.  Good value.

Name: Open/close button very hard to press.
Author: ac_360
Review Text: The automatic open button is very hard to press. I hurt my thumb pushing down on it. But once I got it to open, it works just fine. Though, I still got wet cause it took a while to push the button to open/close it again. Maybe it was defective, but I've never had any button issues with Totes and other brands of umbrellas.

Name: Fits in the outside pouch of a backpack nicely.
Author: colonel
Review Text: This is quality, you can tell by the way it opens and closes and just by holding it.

Name: Just what I wanted
Author: Les Kahler
Review Text: This item is just what I needed. The only problem was the package was opened upon receiving it. All items were there but don't understand why package was opened!

Name: ... yet but the button to open and close is pretty cool. Seems like it may be problematic later ...
Author: Thomas
Review Text: Hasn't rained yet but the button to open and close is pretty cool. Seems like it may be problematic later on. We will see. Nice and small. I dig it.

Name: travel size
Author: AXSBUS64
Review Text: Perfect for one person.  Small for two people.  Press button open and extension. Press second time to close. Manually push it to fully close position. Well made.

Name: Five Stars
Author: ATHANASIUS
Review Text: Very well made, delivered as promised. Constructed with heavy duty stretchers and ribs.. it laughs at wind and rain..

Name: but it's not like it's an exausting task
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Arrived when promissed A+.  Opens and closes with a touch of the button (very entertaining).  Takes a little extra effort to fullly close it, but it's not like it's an exausting task.  Hasn't rained since it arrived (go figure) but I'm sure it will do a fine job keeping the rain off my head.

Name: Solid unit...
Author: *JEFF CREEDEN*
Review Text: Bringing it to Ireland on July 3rd. Tested it's function at home and it appears to be well built and high quality... I shopped around before buying this brand and found this to be the best quality and the best deal...

Name: A good one.
Author: Happy Jack
Review Text: In Oregon a good umbrella is an important piece of equipment. This is the best one I have ever had. Recommend highly.

Name: Great for keeping in the car
Author: Paddy
Review Text: Was great.  Bought for family member and it got stolen out of shopping cart two days later.  Bought another in red, so it wouldn't be forgotten.

Name: Easily Worth More Than The Price
Author: By The Numbers
Review Text: Very solidly made.  I especially like the way that it closes.  You don't need the effort that you usually need with other well-made umbrellas.

Name: Great umbrella for the price
Author: Nick P
Review Text: Great umbrella for the price, solid construction. Small enough to fit inside a backpack water-bottle holster (where I keep mine).When deployed, will comfortably shield one person. Can squeeze two under, but probably not more than that (unless they're children).

Name: Quality umbrella
Author: vasya24
Review Text: Well made and easy to use. A bit heavier than I would prefer for travel but hopefully worth the way as it stands up to the elements.

Name: A little small, but that's my fault for not ...
Author: Blake Ballard
Review Text: A little small, but that's my fault for not checking the measurements. It's JUST big enough to keep a single person dry in a light downpour. During a storm with wind and all, you might get a little wet from the rain coming at you at an angle.

Name: Great, sturdy umbrellas!
Author: Tamara S. Barlow
Review Text: We purchased these to take to Europe and Iceland.  We had some really windy and rainy days.  The umbrellas held up to both better than any I have used in the past.  They were a tiny bit heavier than ideal for travel but definitely worth it.

Name: Garcinia Cambogia & Apple Cider Vinegar Weight Loss Combo - Assorted Styles
Author: Marie C Torres
Review Text: Good size and I think this gift for a friend will be a lovely surprise when he gets it at Christmas.

Name: Great product!
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Great product!.  This has been used several times now and works as described.  Customer service followup email was nice....good to see they are there if needed!

Name: The quality is excellent and the mechanisms are smooth and effortless
Author: Leebury
Review Text: The moment you put this in your hand you know it is not an ordinary travel umbrella.  The quality is excellent and the mechanisms are smooth and effortless.  I'm looking forward to a rainy day!

Name: ... gift so haven't tried it out but service was fine and product looks great
Author: Betsey
Review Text: Bought this for a Christmas gift so haven't tried it out but service was fine and product looks great.  Would recommend this item and this company.

Name: Five Stars
Author: S. Wigginton
Review Text: Seems to be well built. Compact and lightweight. We'll see how it holds up over time.

Name: Excellent customer service
Author: Evelyn Schoepp
Review Text: I purchased this umbrella in early February and after maybe 10 uses it broke. The umbrella will not fully close or stay open. Pretty disappointed due to all of the raving reviews.**UPDATE: the company contacted me immediately offering to ship me a new umbrella absolutely free and refund my money for the old one. Such excellent customer service that it is worth giving them another shot!

Name: I recommend. Thanks
Author: vshard
Review Text: "5 Stars" Product. High quality. I recommend. Thanks.

Name: Five Stars
Author: Fluffy
Review Text: A very handy umbrella. Very compact in size. Feels well constructed.

Name: I gotta say this is an amazing umbrella. Only complaint would be that the handle ...
Author: Rose Gray
Review Text: I gotta say this is an amazing umbrella. Only complaint would be that the handle is a bit short so I have to hold my arm higher up in the air which is slightly tiring but I think I will survive...

Name: Weather tested
Author: Michelle Bautista
Review Text: I bought these for a trip to New York. While we saw abandoned broken umbrellas everywhere ours held strong. Love the click open and close feature. Small and compact, great for travel!

Name: Perfect.
Author: Constance Iler
Review Text: It looks great, was a good price and with the guarantee I can't go wrong. The opening and closing mechanism is working exactly as described. I love it.

Name: Have used for less than a week, already busted and flipped twice.
Author: KMc
Review Text: So very disappointed. This "windproof" umbrella turned inside out twice this morning within 5 minutes. The quality is equally poor with one of the prongs (sorry, I don't know the official name) also being detached from the fabric within two days.

Name: Great Umbrella.
Author: D. Wall
Review Text: This is my second umbrella.  I bought it to carry in my laptop bag and as a backup to the one first I bought to keep in the car.  Works well to repel rain, open, closes and dries quickly.

Name: Broke after 4-5 uses
Author: B. Davis
Review Text: I maybe opened the umbrella 4-5 times before it broke. The plastic piece connecting the canopy to the rod broke, so there was also no way to repair it.UPDATE, FEB. 28th, 2017The seller reached out to me last week to apologize for the inconvenience and offered me a refund or new umbrella. For that, i've changed my review from one to four stars.

Name: Great little umbrella and seller!
Author: Jason
Review Text: Great compact and tough umbrella! really pleased with it and the sellers customer service. An all around good transaction from top to bottom. Item description was accurate and delivery was prompt, living in the Great Northwest you need a quick light effective umbrella and I think a found one here! Thanks

Name: Like most compactible umbrellas I've used
Author: Dan
Review Text: Does it's job well, just wish it was a little larger in diameter.  Like most compactible umbrellas I've used, I can't easily cover myself and a backpack.

Name: Terrible - invest in something that is wind-resistant
Author: MLW
Review Text: This item was terrible.  It was not at all wind-resistant, and broke  immediately when exposed to wind.  One of the joints snapped, rendering the entire thing useless.  I want my money back, but don't see any option for return.

Author: D. PLANTE

Name: Five Stars
Author: Rigoberto
Review Text: Very responsible seller, the quality of the product is impressive as the presentation where it comes.

Name: Great Product
Author: DottieDot
Review Text: This is the best folding umbrella I have ever had. The size is large..certainly large enough to protect two people from the rain.  It fits nicely into my purse. Opens with a click and closes the same way.

Name: Heavy duty construction to tolerate heavy rains and wind

Review Text: Very sturdy and medium size. It appears as though it will withstand some powerful winds and rain. Time with tell

Name: Better Built then Usual Ones

Review Text: When I got this item, it is obvious this is better built then usual ones I have seen. This is a gift item so I did not use it but it worth saying it is guaranteed item from the vendor.

Name: Five Stars

Review Text: Seems sturdy and well-made. Haven't had a chance to test it out yet, but rain's in the forecast.

Name: Love this umbrella

Name: How would I rate it?

Name: Nice Umbrella, Decent Price
Author: K. Walters
Review Text: I have only used this a few times so far but I like it.  It is a very compact umbrella and seems to be well made.

Name: Haven't had a chance to use it yet. Hope ...
Author: Blake Johnson
Review Text: Haven't had a chance to use it yet. Hope not to have to for a while. Opens and closes as it should. Lightweight. Should work well!

Name: Nice umbrella!

Review Text: I ordered this umbrella to carry in my car. It has a good quality feel to it and I think it will do a great job when I need it.

Name: Five Stars

Review Text: Great !!! Really wind proof and put away dry. A little rag doesn't hurt for a stray rain drop.

Name: Great umbrella!
Author: R.S.E.
Review Text: The umbrella is sturdy and a quality product. I like the small size that is easy to pack.

Name: It just looks like it's stained
Author: Grace Polivka
Review Text: The color of the umbrella seemed off a bit, not sure how to explain it. It just looks like it's stained? I don't know. It works amazing either way. I used it in a wind storm on purpose and I was more afraid of it leaving my hand than it flipping.

Name: must buy. great product
Author: M.B
Review Text: strong amazing umbrella, highly recommend.

Name: Great little umbrella
Author: Alex W.

Name: Nice umbrella. Push a button for it to go ...
