Review Text: Nice umbrella. Push a button for it to go up and push a button and it automatically goes down. Good quality.

Name: Fits in my front door pocket
Author: J. SNOW
Review Text: Light weight retractable umbrella. Easy to use.

Name: Great umbrella!
Author: J. McD.
Review Text: Great umbrella! Auto open/close is great! Fast shipping, great price! This is perfect for traveling, which we do a lot of. I bought this for my wife, but I think I'll get one for myself also.

Name: Five Stars
Author: isc123
Review Text: Just what the doctor ordered for a thunderstorm.  Works really well.

Name: Nice, compact umbrella - cool open/close button
Author: JB Ski #3
Review Text: Just got it today... opens and closes with the press of an button. We'll see how it holds up in the wind (pretty much the only reason I've ever had to purchase an umbrella). So far, it looks to be good quality, and will fis nicely in the seat pocket of my car.

Name: Great!
Author: Zoe W
Review Text: I got this based on the recommendation of TheSweetHome.com and it has lived up to their assessment of it.

Name: Four Stars

Review Text: Well designed, I wish it extended slightly further, otherwise I would have given this a 5 star rating.

Name: Sturdy
Author: Barbara M
Review Text: It hold up great in the wind and pouring rain which we‰Ûªve had a lot of.  Love it!

Name: Durable umbrella

Review Text: Love the compact umbrella.  So far it's holding up and it's been raining for last two weeks.

Name: Compact and sturdy.

Name: Easy open easy close
Author: Dr.Susie
Review Text: This umbrella opens with the push of a button. It also closes very easily with one push on the top as it snaps closed. I haven't been out in the rain yet but it looks very sturdy.

Name: Travel Umbrella
Author: lionlady
Review Text: The product is great. Lightweight and easy to carry.

Name: Rainy Days
Author: RJones
Review Text: It appears this will be a nice umbrella that I plan to take along as I travel. Seems well made and was easy to open.

Name: Compact, and easy to use
Author: Jonluke
Review Text: I like how portable this umbrella is, it fits easily into my backpack on campus.  It opens and closes easily as well.  I have yet to get caught in a downpour, but I am glad that I will be ready.

Name: BOMB CYCLONE PROOF
Author: Alexander T.

They couldn't handle the 40+ MPH Winds.This umbrella lasted on a leisurely stroll from 38th and 5th to 43rd and Lexington with ease in 40+MPH Winds. Completely cyclone proof, highly recommend!

Name: Exactly as expected.
Author: Tim R.
Review Text: Exactly as expected. Might have wanted a slightly bigger size in retrospect though.

Name: arrive on time and excellent condition. Unfortunately ran in N Ga this morning ...
Author: Judi Miller
Review Text: arrive on time and excellent condition.  Unfortunately ran in N Ga this morning so put umbrella to good use.  works like a dream

Name: Four Stars
Author: Daniel Hui
Review Text: A tad heavier than I originally thought this would be but definitely does the job.

Name: High quality, Nice Travel features.
Author: Ryan
Review Text: The handle is small but is made up for by the compact size. Seems to be a great construction and it is easy to deploy and store umbrella. Also the size is great.

Name: Replace after first one broke

Review Text: I am amending my 1-star review.  I live in a wet area of the country and after only 4 months, one of the interior ribs broke.  I had only used it a couple times which was disappointing.  I am very pleased with Upper Echelon Products as they sent a new one.  Thank you.

Name: Great Umbrella
Author: C. Hough
Review Text: Great umbrella. Seems very high quality. Great to know that with its warranty, I should never need to buy another again.

Name: Great umbrella for on the go.
Author: Bing Zheng
Review Text: Auto open and close functionality worked as expected. Umbrella was big enough to cover me and still fit into a small bag.

Name: Excellent umbrella, excellent customer service
Author: Bonnie Nelson
Review Text: Very cool umbrella - compact, strong, pops up and retracts with a button. I had an issue with the first one I purchased, it was replaced immediately. Very satisfied with how I was treated.

Name: Opens easily, closes fine but its hard to push the ...
Author: Jim
Review Text: Opens easily , closes fine but its hard to push the top to the bottom.  I Like it.

Name: Wouldn't purchase again
Author: MP45
Review Text: Horrible quality. Used it 3 times before it broke. Would definitely not recommend

Name: Love the auto open and close feature!
Author: R.D.H.
Review Text: Just received the umbrella yesterday.  Looks real good.  Repels water just like advertised.  The button open and close is a great feature.Now just can't wait for rain....

Name: Portable and works great. Not the biggest but for one person it ...
Author: Mack
Review Text: Portable and works great.  Not the biggest but for one person it works well, can't expect anything more from such a convenient and portable umbrella.  Fits in my backpack very easily.

Name: I love how small and compact the size is when it's ...
Author: Jfred
Review Text: I received the umbrella quickly. I used it the other day when it was pouring out. Did what it was supossed to do. I love how small and compact the size is when it's folded down. One handed opening is great!

Name: Sturdy and easy open and close
Author: Andrew P. Mezey
Review Text: Easy open and close. Sturdy feel. Large enough but not too large for one person. I like it better than other collapsible umbrellas that I have had. Would definitely buy it again. Life time guarantee is very attractive.

Name: Good product
Author: Mary J Stanton........
Review Text: Quick delivery, well made and decent price! Would recommended this item to my friends and family, well worth the money.

Name: surprising how well this one is. I have had ...
Author: Jason Connor
Review Text: surprising how well this one is.  I have had other brand name ones and they didn't feel nearly as well made.

Name: Just as promised.
Author: Sausage321
Review Text: I ordered 3 umbrellas for travel and general use.  They arrived promptly and exactly as shown.  The functions are simple to use and repacking into the protective sleeve is simple.  I appreciate the size of the open coverage as two people could easily share one umbrella and remain 90% dry with just a bit of exposure on the outside shoulders.  I also am very glad to have the included lifetime warranty.

Name: I like the way it opens and closes
Author: C. Hampton Perry
Review Text: Works well and seems to be a robust design. I like the way it opens and closes. I may order more and give them to my family as gifts.

Name: Five Stars
Author: K. Swain
Review Text: Used it Sunday. Water came right off.

Name: strong and comfortable to use
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Compact, strong and comfortable to use. Easily stores for those times you need it. I expect it will last for many years.

Name: I feel good about this umbrella.
Author: toddmilner
Review Text: Feels durable and solid. works smoothly and the canopy size is good.

Name: Arrived in good order, quickly
Author: Melora
Review Text: Haven't used it yet, but it sheds water! The water springs off of it. One shake and it's dry. No more putting a wet umbrella into the car. Arrived in good order, quickly. There is a little piece that broke off somewhere in shipment, but it's an unimportant piece of trim.

Name: works well
Author: reg 67
Review Text: seems to work well although I haven't been able to test it in either high wind or rain or the combination yet.

Name: Best umbrella ever!
Author: Yizhen Cai
Review Text: This umbrella is super sturdy. I live in NYC where the wind tunnel effect is very intense. This umbrella did not get blown away or flip on me. Honestly the best purchase I've made.

Name: Good quality
Author: L Taylor
Review Text: Nice umbrella, sturdy, didn't rust. If I could find a way to keep from leaving them places, that'd be even better.

Name: This is an excellent umbrella. It is well constructed and durable
Author: Douglas Gould
Review Text: This is an excellent umbrella. It is well constructed and durable. I purchased 2, one for my wife and one for myself. We both love them.

Name: Weathered a major storm in NYC
Author: hari subramanian
Review Text: NYC just had a major storm with some of the heaviest winds I've seen and I just took a walk in it to the subway with this umbrella.  I'm actually waiting for a train and writing this review.Umbrella held up extremely well in the rain/wind combo and is very sturdy. Didn't wobble at all when a nice wind hit, as cheaper umbrellas would do. By the time I reached the subway platform, my umbrella dried off faster than my North Face boots, a huge plus for me.Only thing about this umbrella is that it's a bit on the narrow side so, as a stocky guy, my left elbow got wet. The measurements were very clear in the product description so it's my fault there. I don't mind the smaller size though - helps to not have a giant umbrella when walking through NYC.I would highly recommend this product but be wearing if you're a bit taller or wider.

Name: Great customer service
Author: JackB
Review Text: Works as an umbrella should.  I bought two and one broke immediately when I received it.  I contacted customer service and they were able to get another one out to us within 2 days.  Great service!  May be some quality control issues, but their customer service and price makes up for it.  So far I've had them for 6 months and they're still working great!

Name: Four Stars
Author: digitalcraftsman
Review Text: The badge on the pommel of the handle came somewhat scuffed up.

Name: Five Stars
Author: Zachary
Review Text: The most‰ÛÜ durable umbrella I've ever come across at a very reasonable rate.

Name: A winner
Author: Ira C.
Review Text: Well made, holds up to very well towind and rain. I wish they made a larger version even if it was larger when folded.

Name: It's pretty light, as far as umbrellas go
Author: bri
Review Text: It's pretty light, as far as umbrellas go. We got it to go in my purse for a trip to Seattle. Works well, but it doesn't really cover two people, so keep that in mind!

Name: I like the way it opens
Author: S. Martino
Review Text: It hasn't rained, so I couldn't give the umbrella a real-world test.  I like the way it opens, though, and the workmanship seems good.  It's not too heavy for its size, either.  I did stick it under the tap and was happy to see that indeed, the water doesn't stay on it.  I don't have a lot of space outside to air dry umbrellas, so I'm glad I won't have to do that.

Name: It is easy to operate and has a nice ergonomic handle
Author: Forrest Crosier
Review Text: I haven't use this yet but it appears to be well made.  It is easy to operate and has a nice ergonomic handle.  It would be nice if it had wind vents to allow the wind to pass through the top and  prevent it from becoming inverted when subjected to wind.  If it did I would have given it five stars.

Name: Nice
Author: bjtrn55
Review Text: This seems to be a nice umbrella, but I haven't had a chance to use it yet due to the nice weather. We will see how it  holds up over the long haul.

Name: Teflon Coated Travel Umbrella
Author: Steven W. Funderburg
Review Text: The umbrellas got a good workout in New Orleans during tropical storm Cindy.  They open and close easily and the teflon coating works well shedding rain.  A very good value for the price.

Name: Ready for the RAIN!!!!!
Author: Nippon gamer
Review Text: Very fast shipping. Even though I live in Socal, we get occasional rain that can still ruin your day without proper gear. This is a small compact umbrella that I can pretty much store anywhere. The material doesn't feel cheap and is very light. When opening up the umbrella, its enough to shelter you from the rain. This is a great product that I would buy as gifts for family.

Name: Sturdy umbrella
Author: Sandra K. Hendricks
Review Text: Had to throw out a couple of old umbrellas recently, so I was looking forward to receiving this product.  Just received it yesterday, so no opportunity to use, as of yet, but I risked a ton of bad luck by opening it indoors!!  Loved hearing the solid 'thwump' as I pushed the button. Smoothly opened to a nice sturdy umbrella. Very easy open and close, and generous coverage.  I think this is going to meet my needs perfectly.

Name: Great umbrella even with wind.
Author: Joe Bieselin
Review Text: Great umbrellas. They keep me dry when it is wet out. The button opens and closes the umbrella.

Name: Five Stars
Author: W.Jackson
Review Text: It opens and shuts easily and it is large. Best of all it is wind-proof...a great umbrella.

Name: Five Stars

Review Text: The absolute best umbrella I've ever bought. Remember it's the smaller sized umbrella though.

Name: was disappointed.

Review Text: Live in Illinois and first time I used it the wind made it flip inside out.  was disappointed.

Name: High quality, fantastic umbrella

Review Text: Fantastic umbrella (LOVE the lifetime warranty).  You can tell the quality difference for sure, the spring is very powerful.

Name: Best Umbrella
Author: Daniel Holman
Review Text: Top rated umbrella by The Sweet Home. This is a fantastic little umbrella. It stands up to the wind and repells water. It stood up under gusts of 20-30mph yesterday. Saw a lot of broken umbrellas.  Buy this, you won't be disappointed.

Name: easy go-to umbrella, always opens/closes FAST!

Name: Five Stars

Name: Five Stars

Name: Best umbrella I've ever used

Review Text: I purchased a couple of these a few months ago to travel with and the worked great, even in strong Norwegian winds.  Was so happy with them that I ordered another to keep in the car.The auto open/close feature is really nice.  Very sturdy construction.  Probably won't have to buy another umbrella any time soon.

Name: Perfect for a backpack or purse.

Review Text: Great umbrella, I just wish it was a bit bigger. The self open and close work great though, and it fits well in my backpack so I always carry it with me.

Excellent, prompt customer service and overall a good purchase.

Review Text: Arrived quickly and looks good. Looking forward to testing it out on the rainy weather we've been having. If I remember, I'll update in a couple months to see if it's lasted. Mostly I'm very excited for the lifetime warranty, hope it's as great as it sounds!

Review Text: Nice umbrella so far. I haven't had a chance to test it out in the rain, but it seems well made and opens/closes easily. Also not difficult to get it back into it's storage pouch, which can sometimes be challenging. I'm happy with my purchase.

Name: Nice

Name: It feels pretty sturdy instead of cheaply made like other umbrellas I've ...

Review Text: I haven't had the chance to test this out in the rain, yet. It feels pretty sturdy instead of cheaply made like other umbrellas I've had. I also really like the button you use to open and close the canopy. I think the most frustrating part of an umbrella has always been struggling with closing it while your hands are cold or it's windy. This makes that sooo much easier.Like I said, I haven't tested it in the environment it was made for, but I'm impressed.

Name: Would not recommend.

Name: Great!

Name: This easy touch umbrella was unfazed

Review Text: I love my new umbrella!!! It is very sturdy and will be able to handle strong winds. That's pretty good for a collapsible umbrella. My only very minor complaint is that it is a bit heavier than the super cheap umbrellas you buy at the drugstore. I was hoping to put it in my 14 years old daughter's backpack to use when she goes to school, but it is a bit too big. With this said, I plan on using this umbrella instead, and truly love it.

Name: Lovely Umbrella

Review Text: Looks like a very sturdy umbrella, and wife loves the cloud theme! She has yet to use it in rainy weather, I'm assuming it's gonna work.

Name: Five Stars

I have been carrying it around in my laptop bag and barely notice the difference in the weight (to be fair, I usually do carry a lot though).

Name: Four Stars

Review Text: Of course, since it arrived, it stopped raining.  Later this week however, I should get a chance to chack it out.  First imnpressions are good, sturdy well put together.  I like the size.  Should work out, but stay tuned.

Name: The open/close mechanism on the handle makes it easy to get in and out of cars quickly
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Been raining a ton in Northern California, so I've had plenty of opportunities to test this out in heavy wind and downpours. I've walked past a lot of people whose umbrellas inverted while mine held up perfectly. The open/close mechanism on the handle makes it easy to get in and out of cars quickly. I've only had it for a month, but I'm going to give it five stars because of the number of times and the conditions in which I've used it.

Name: Punches above its weight

Review Text: Excellent little umbrella.  This umbrella is tougher than it looks and works well.  Great turnaround from the seller too.

Name: The mechanics of the umbrella are great. It opens and closes very easily now I'm ...

It opens and closes very easily now I'm waiting to see how it sheds water after using it in a rain.  I'm thinking this would be a good high school graduation gift for those going on to college.

Name: This umbrella is AWESOME! I haven't tested whether it will flip during ...
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: This umbrella is AWESOME! I haven't tested whether it will flip during very windy rainy days, but so far, it's been great.

Just buy it and you won't regret it .. trust me!!

Review Text: The same week I got my umbrella, Portland had a huge wind and rain storm. As I walked through this storm going to work the umbrella held up fantastically! I was also able to shake off the excess water and store it in a locker all day without getting my other things wet. A regular umbrella would stay wet all day! Seriously amazing umbrella!

I am hoping my new umbrella will not break for a long time.

Name: Perfect Umbrella for the Price.
Author: Crossfire
Review Text: My  old  umbrella and I went on an Uber ride. I came home. The umbrella didn't .I bought this one on Amazon and it arrived when promised. This umbrella is perfect. It folds tight and neatly. The spring is super-strong and snaps the umbrella out and into place crisply.  The fabric is strong, smooth, and durable. It resists the wind and does its job keeping the rain at bay. Today it was rainy and gusty. This little gadget proved itself admirably. I would highly recommend this product.About the seller. Mostly, I find that sellers on Amazon are quite anonymous, as they probably should be. But today I got an email from the seller with all his info, return policy, lifetime warranty, and a note of appreciation.  It was a nice touch and I actually appreciated receiving the email. A class act.

Name: It's so good, other's may take it!
Author: A. Friedrich
Review Text: I have bought three of these umbrella's as the first was either mislaid or taken.  The second order was for two, and I have put one away because my husband says "good umbrellas disappear like a used matchstick".  This umbrella is well made with heavy ribs that will not bend in a strong wind and the open/close feature works well.  It has a heavier weight than some travel umbrellas, but this is due to better materials in construction.  I have no hesitation in recomending this umbrella.  I purchased it after researching Briggs umbrellas and some of the most expensive umbrellas on the market as a Christmas gift for my husband who wanted a open/close umbrella, but never bought one for himself.  He was downhearted when it was gone, but I immediately ordered two more.  Prompt delivery was a plus in wet weather!  An extra never hurts!

Name: Short and got blown inside out
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: I got this umbrella because we've been getting some crazy windy and rainy weather in my area and I did not have a "travel umbrella" that could resist the wind. I also chose it because it was not expensive. When I first opened the umbrella I thought that I had opened it incorrectly because it seemed short, then I realized that it was just made that way. A week or two later it was windy and drizzling, so I used the umbrella. The umbrella fought most gusts of wind, but one particularly strong one did flip it inside out. The umbrella did not break, and I was able to flip it back. I find the instant open and close button amusing but I have to be careful not to accidentally press it because it is a bit sensitive and not that difficult to accidentally trigger. Overall this is not a bad umbrella but I don't feel like it lived up to the promises.

Name: Time will tell
Author: S
Review Text: Upon initial inspection, this is a little smaller than I was anticipating. My wife and I have been sharing an umbrella by a company called Rainbrella. No idea where the umbrella came from, but it's great. It has a slightly bigger handle than the Repel Umbrella, and it has grooves in the handle to hold it better (I love this feature). I decided it's probably time to get my own umbrella, so I bought this based off of reviews. I am comparing the Repel with the Rainbrella, which is our favorite. Our old umbrella also has a longer height when extended (about 1.5-2 inches longer than the Repel). Width is not that big of a difference to really bother me, although the Repel is a tad smaller. I was a little disappointed that the height is shorter on the Repel but perhaps this is a good thing. The Repel folded up is a little shorter than the other one so it will fit in my bag better. I needed something small and unobtrusive to carry to work. I live in Chicago and I'm starting a job pretty close to the lake, so I wanted something pretty wind resistant. I was a little skeptical of the Repel because it seemed too good to be true and I have never heard of this company, but with 77% of people liking the product, I decided to give it a shot. It's a little pricey, but not much more than a Totes umbrella I bought a while back that was about $20.I will update when I actually test it.

Name: Good umbrella for the price
Author: Fenix8452
Review Text: Light weight, but feels very durable.  It has quite the excited opening mechanism, so hold on to it until you know what to expect.  The auto collapse feature is perfect for me while I'm trying to get into my car while it's raining.The ties all feel and look strong; of course the test of time will tell if it's perfect, but so far it appears much better made than the cheaper ones I find at gas stations and big box stores.  It was shorter and fatter than my last umbrella, and I like the dimensions here better than my last one.  This is easier to shove into a big pocket or to fit into a bag or I presume a purse.The rubberized grip and button feel very sturdy and solid, and so far the button requires enough of a press that I've never accidentally collapsed it when I haven't intended on it.  So far, under very heavy rain, it's been perfectly waterproof.  I know that should be a given, but you might be amazed at how many cheap umbrellas I've gotten and returned because somehow a spot or two would leak.

Name: Decent umbrella, compromised handle, obnoxiously pushy seller
Author: Kirk H.
Review Text: The umbrella works as any umbrella its size.The single button press deployment and canopy folding are nice features.I have only used it in the rain once so far.Now, why this would get a four star review from me:The handle on this is not as grippy as I would like. I feel like a more grippy rubber finish or pistol grip would help.When it was buffeted by wind gusts I needed to have a finger looped over the handle in order to keep hold.Why this product got three stars:Within the first two days after the product was to be delivered I got two emails requesting reviews of the products, particularly positive reviews of the product, and with a discount code to the seller's store.This feels very pushy for a positive review.Realistically, it's an umbrella. And maybe, assuming it lasts a long time and hold up well, it might prove to be a good umbrella with a compromised handle.Maybe I'll revisit this again. Hopefully it holds up well.

Name: Never had a chance to use it but seems as if it might be okay
Author: broodizt
Review Text: I am leaving a product review even though I have not had a chance to use this product because the company keeps emailing me to leave a review.  So in the hopes that this will stop them from annoying me every couple of weeks, I'm leaving a review of 3 stars because that is the middle range.  I have no real idea how good this umbrella is until I actually use the thing, but these folks want a review pronto, so I'll go along and give a lower review than if I had waited and loved it and would have given it a 5 star review, or maybe a higher review if I used it and hated it and would have given it a one star review. I opened the umbrella and it opened well, closing it was a little harder as you have to push the umbrella together and down to actually get it back to size to fit in it's case.  Getting it in the case was the hardest of all-the umbrella and I tangled a bit, and it did seem as though the umbrella was winning, but I finally triumphed and was able to stuff the thing back in it's case.  This is all i know so far.  When and if it rains in SoCAl, hopefully I'll know more.

Name: Umbrella disappoints on a not-so windy day
Author: mspeedwagon
Review Text: Update: The company saw my review and pro-actively reached out to me. This is actually a first for me and I'm rather impressed. The offered to replace or refund the money given my disappointment with the product I received. Kudos to their customer service. I've moved up my star rating. It's clearly a company that cares to retain their customers.Living on the west coast of Florida there is often light to moderate wind that accompanies the rain here. I searched Amazon for a wind resistant umbrella and opted to purchase this. Unfortunately, this umbrella fared far worse in the wind than my last one. A slight gust of wind almost snapped the umbrella (turned it inside-out and almost broke it). This was far more expensive than my last umbrella (which I unfortunately lost), but nowhere near as good. I do not recommend this product.

Name: For those considering this umbrella, it does not lock ...
Author: Cblanca
Review Text: For those considering this umbrella, it does not lock when fully open.  The parts of the shaft can still move up and down, but under spring-like tension.  This may be an effort to help it become more "windproof".  So if pointing this into the wind and rain the effective length of the shaft will become somewhat shorter.  Also, to clarify closing, when you press the close button there is a hard snap sound and the umbrella violently closes the canopy.  At this point, per the instructions, you now have to place one palm on top of the closed wet umbrella with the other palm on the base of the handle, and push it together.  I have tried pulling it down from the inside but this requires quite a bit of force, as others have mentioned.  The canopy is 37" wide when open, not 42".  Hope this helps.Edit (Aug. 16th, 2017):  There is no way to reopen the umbrella after pressing the close button.  The open button does not work at this point and even attempting to reopen the canopy does not work.  You Must fully close it with both hands into the closed and Locked position before you can reopen.  Also, some rain comes through the area where the canopy is sewn to the arms.  I have down-graded my star rating to 3 Stars.

Name: Okay.
Author: Rebecca Perry
Review Text: It's a fine umbrella unless you live in a windy climate. The button to activate the umbrella is hard to push, and harder still is getting the umbrella back into its original position. It requires a lot of jamming and jerking, eventually warping the bar, making it useless. That's fine and I expect to buy umbrellas often since I moved to a windier climate. What bothers me more is feeling pressured to leave a review by the company by constant emails. When they read my original review, they offered a refund or replacement, which is very sweet, but at this point, I just want to be left alone.If you use an umbrella once every so often, it's decent for the price. Maybe I got a defective button or catch. I don't know. I'm sick of Amazon's companies constant emails to "check in" after they already have my money.

Name: Cannot be closed! again!
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: I bought 2 of these this January. Used one for about 5 times so far and it is fine, feels sturdy too. I put the other one in the car and used it today for the vary 1st time and, it cannot be closed! Wow, talk about quality!Update, The merchant contacted me upon my early review and refunded me. The customer service is top notch and obviously, they took the issue seriously. I think my experience with the umbrella is not typical since the overwhelming positive reviews. Thanks.Well. The new umbrella I got from the merchant has the same problem, not closing! I have to seriously question the QC here? I am basically speechless!

Name: Problems with the first umbrella... and the second...
Author: M. Gorman
Review Text: Updated:I was incredibly disappointed when the second time I used this it broke.  There was a breeze, but it wasn't strong enough to even be called wind in my book.  But still, snap, one of the spines broke right in half.  I had expected better from a $5 umbrella, never mind a $25 one.I sent an email to the company letting them know I was disappointed and surprised.  Within minutes (this was 8pm-ish on a Friday evening) I had a response letting me know a new umbrella was already ordered and being shipped to me.  I asked if they wanted the old one back to diagnose what happened but they said not to worry about it, and not to go through the hassle of shipping it back.Here's the update:After 5 uses it broke in exactly the same place the first one did.  I don't want a replacement anymore, it's unreliable garbage.

After reading my review, customer service at Upper Echelon not only refunded my money, but offered me a new umbrella, free. Now I have two, each from a different brand. I keep one in the car an the other in the office, to insure I can't get wet. So far so good with the replacement. Five stars for service and four for the new umbrella. Nothing more need be said unless lightening strikes twice, pun intended.

Review Text: Excellent, sturdy umbrella tested by intense storms in NorCal/Santa Cruz area this week.

Name: Usually I don't write reviews unless I absolutely love an item and can give it an unqualified recommendation
Author: KSR
Review Text: Usually I don't write reviews unless I absolutely love an item and can give it an unqualified recommendation.However, this vendor has sent me repeated emails asking for my review so here it is.This is a very sturdy umbrella, and I expect to have no problems with it breaking.However, I ordered it due to its' description as 'one hand operation'.It does have a button to close the umbrella. This button works great.My personal issue is that if I bother with an umbrella at all, it is because I am going to meetings carrying things I do not want to get wet.Heavy files, models, rolls of drawings...When returning to a vehicle with arms loaded, closing an umbrella in the rain while putting items in the car and escaping the rain is tricky.Though I can push the button to collapse the tines, actually pushing the umbrella closed to a locked position requires two hands.Because the umbrella is so sturdy, it is hard to push down while maneuvering into the driver's seat of a car.One must use two hands outside of the car door, getting wet while doing so.I hope to have this umbrella for a while, and I am sure it will serve well during normal use.But I will look for another umbrella which totally collapses more easily to use when I go to meetings in the rain.

Name: BUT IS GREAT COMPACT AND STRONG AS I ESPECTED
Author: GERARDO ANGELES
Review Text: WELL I JUST GET IT, BUT IS GREAT COMPACT AND STRONG AS I ESPECTED.

Author: Ranjith Kumar
Review Text: Great umbrella and worth for the money. Cheap and best one.

Author: Crisinda Cooper

Name: Five Stars
Author: Liza R.
Review Text: Seems like a great umbrella!

Author: Donna
Review Text: Great umbrella.  Sturdy and compact.

Name: Four Stars

Review Text: Good quality _Ù÷_

Review Text: Great

Author: Meng-Hsuan
Review Text: good quality, but not big.

Review Text: FAB

Name: Five Stars
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: good

Name: Five Stars
Author: J Levy PA-C, SFHM
Review Text: great umbrella

Name: Five Stars
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Great price/Great Product

Name: One Star
Author: Faisal N. Shaikh
Review Text: Broke after one use

Name: Fine to use as long as you don't expose it to water
Author: PK
Review Text: After all of two uses, many of the components have already developed a layer of rust that has stained the fabric. I would have gladly paid a little extra for something rust resistant. It's too bad, since the umbrella otherwise seemed promising in terms of its size and mechanism. Oh well, into the trash it goes.Edit: I've modified my original rating of 1 star to 3, to reflect the positive experience that I've had with the seller, who responded very promptly and has offered me both a refund and replacement umbrella without my even needing to send the original unit back. I'll be giving it another shot. Hopefully it goes better this time.

Name: One Star
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: broke within 6 months

Name: Fantastic Choice!
Author: Allison
Review Text: This is the perfect umbrella to keep in your car. The umbrella isn't too small but then it isn't too large. It's a perfect size. It comes with a strap already attached to the handle to help you hold the umbrella in the harsh weather. On the handle there's a button when you push it the umbrella expands. It also has a storage pouch they keep the umbrella in when you're not using it. It extends a pretty good length. Two people can fit underneath the umbrella at one time. The umbrella is extremely light. It is also made very well and will work great in harsh weather. An all around great umbrella! I did receive this item for free in exchange of my honest opinion.

Name: I did not like this umbrella
Author: M&M
Review Text: I did not like this umbrella. When opened, it is very small and hardly can keep your head and back dry at the same time. While it fold small, it closes with difficulty, and gives so little coverage, there is not a huge difference between having this umbrella over you, or just taking a walk in the rain. I will be returning the umbrellas I got and upgrading to something with a larger circumference.

Name: Durable
Author: tpuah
Review Text: This is a nice umbrella.  I was able to use this once and it repels rain well and easy to handle.  I like the size and weight and the fact that it has a simple button to open and close the umbrella .  I have not had any issues with opening or closing this product.  It folds up nicely and back into the cover easily.  The material at the top of the umbrella looks like it is not all intact and may come apart after some use, but that does not affect its workmanship.  The bars inside seem pretty durable and flexible to withstand a little wind too.

Name: Well built
Author: MeTechGeek
Review Text: I have to say this is one of the most sturdiest umbrellas I have ever had.  For a small compact umbrella it has some weight to it.  It is very well built and made of nice material.  I could spend all day pushing the button to auto open and close the umbrella just because it's so fun.  The water resistance top is nice, since most of the water beads up and runs off the umbrella and drys quickly from what I tested.  If you what a sturdy umbrella then opt for this one.This product was discounted or free for services rendered for amzreviewtrader.com

Name: They mean wind proof!
Author: Nubia
Review Text: Finally!!!! An umbrella that doesn't blow away. I really had a windy experience  with this umbrella  and it definitely  passed the test. Had to go to the city to run some errands and it was very windy and rainy. While everyone else's umbrella was blowing and bending away this umbrella stood it's ground very sturdy did not bend or break I completed my errands and my umbrella is still in its place great buy. Will  recommend  this  product  to  anyone  who  wants  a  perfect  umbrella. This  product  was  delivered  on  time  and  well  packaged .*this  product  was provided  to  me  at  discounted or free  for  my  honest  review*

Name: Light and durable but does not last long
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Sep/8/2017This umbrella is definitely light and durable, and suitable for travel or when you don't want to carry a gigantic umbrella around in the city. It also dries very quickly. Although the product is not sturdy as you can expext from travel size umbrellas (mine lasted around 10 months before there was a tire in the fabric between the supporting structure and a hole), the company responded to my concern immediately and sent me a new product.Sep 2nd 2017I had this umbrella around 10 months only but the top teared apart (between fabric and supporting structure).  The umbrella is light and durable but does not last long.November 2016Light and durable. And only takes a couple minutes to set the umbrella. The only downside is that you have to completely fold the umbrella to open it again and it takes a bit of muscle to do so (not to mention that I am a weakling as well).

Name: Very easy to open and close dries fast
Author: cedargirl
Review Text: I got the umbrella for free and it's a great umbrella it's pretty compact so it's easy to put in glove box and it comes with the covering for it it has little red button with two grey arrows so when you take the covering off and unhook the umbrella you push the button it will expand out and open up so you can use it when you're done using it you just push the button again and it collapses down and then you just push it down into the handle locked into place wrap the string around it to secure it and then you can put the covering back on

Name: I like the rubbery handle is easy to hold
Author: blackdiamond9
Review Text: Just by the feel of this umbrella you can tell this is a quality product, is solidly built a little heavier, but sturdier than your average umbrella..  is small enough to fit in a backpack, it seems to me it repels water as if it was waxed it dries quicker I would add, I like the rubbery handle is easy to hold, open and close with one hand is a breeze.. the material I would say feels thicker and stronger I had the opportunity to tested and no problems even with a slight wind.  I'm extremely delighted to had purchased this great product.

Name: Breaks itself
Author: anony mouse
Review Text: I received this as a gift. I never got to use it - it tried to open itself up at some point while still inside of its sleeve. I deducted this because the stick was extended in my closet.  When I took it out, it wouldn't work.  It won't open all the way or close all the way, and it won't lock.  I never even got to take it outside :(

Name: Good quality!
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: Heavy Duty!Got this umbrella on a discount but if I was shopping for an umbrella that will hold up and keep me dry I would pay for this one!It's very strong material, it looks professional, and is easy to get out and close up. The button will open it up and close it and there's no need for batteries or anything like that.I believe that this product will last because of how well made it is. Excited to have this in my car for rainy days!I have this 5 stars because I think the umbrella was worth 5 stars but my one complaint would be that the bag that fits over it is hard to put on it again. I wish they would have made it with a stretchy string on the end so you can loosen it up to get the umbrella in. Minor complaint though for such a good product!

Name: GREAT UMBRELLA.. Great size.
Author: MMM
Review Text: GREAT UMBRELLA..  Boy Scouts say be prepared.. This is a great compact (folded ) umbrella -- do yourself a favor -- get one - throw it in your bag and never carry one of those oversized things again.. Great value for staying dry.. This is a string - sturdy - well constructed umbrella.. Get one -- throw it in your bag and never worry about raindrops again.  I have received a discount for giving an honest report for this umbrella.. I believe that tjis is a super strong semi compact umbrella.. great to carry with you.. Five Stars

Name: It's compact and easily fit into her handbag
Author: Quan Ninh
Review Text: This is an extremely light weight umbrella.  I got this for my wife to use.  It's compact and easily fit into her handbag.  It's very light so she can handle it much easier than the one she used to have.  It also auto open and close, just with the push of a button.  When it's closing, she can just push down and get it tied up.  This is strong, surprisingly strong for something light weight.  She loves it so far.I HAD RECEIVED THE ITEM FOR FREE/AT A DISCOUNT IN EXCHANGE FOR AN UNBIASED HONEST FEEDBACK.

Name: Poor quality, but excellent customer service.
Author: derek b liang
Review Text: Update Feb 1, 2018Upper Echelon Products reached out to me and offered a free replacement or full refund. I opted for the latter. Although I still feel this is a low-quality product, excellent customer service should be recognized and rewarded. I am therefore changing the review from 1 to 2 stars.Original Review:Bought this specifically for a trip to Europe. It just broke in light rain and mild winds. Guess we have to deal with this for another week. Sorely disappointed. Avoid.

Name: Very sturdy and reliable compact umbrella
Author: Lebron Games
Review Text: I recently received the Lightweight "Dupont Teflon" Travel Umbrella for free, and couldn't be more pleased with it.  It is a very compact umbrella that takes up minimal space when traveling, isn't heavy, and has a coverage large enough for 2 people to stay pretty dry in a normal rain.  Besides its compact size, I really liked the quick and easy opening with the easy touch button.  It makes both opening and closing a very easy matter.  I work at a University Hospital, and this umbrella has been perfect for keeping in my backpack in case of a stray shower or full rainstorm while walking around campus.  Like I said, I got this for free, but it would definitely be worth the price!

Name: Great Buy and even Greater Company
Author: Laon8or
Review Text: Im used to no umbrella or something that is completely destroyed after a use or two.  This time, I decided to get something that would last.Now, this is no ordinary umbrella! Built tough, great look, and it's compact but roomy enough to share with your lovey, if you hold her close.I actually had a defect on my first shipment where the retract button wouldn't close the umbrella after the second use.  I was mildly annoyed but, everything else worked so, I figured I'd just keep it.  Then, out of the blue, customer service wrote me an email asking about my order and so I told them my problem. They responded quickly with a fix, and when that didn't work they immediately sent me a coupon code for another one for free!  Now here's a company who stands by their product and takes customer service seriously!Great buy, and even greater company!

Name: Needs to come in colors other than black.
Author: Mary Dashwood
Review Text: I like this umbrella. It fits in the outside pocket of my backpack and messenger bags. It opens fast and easily when it's raining and provides decent coverage. Does it make me feel better in when it's cold, wet and dreary out like looking up at my purple umbrella does? No, but it gets the job done. If it came in fun colors I'd give it five stars.

Name: I needed a good umbrella that could stand up to both
Author: Chris boutin
Review Text: Being I live in Northwest Arkansas and we get a lot of rain and also its extremely windy, I needed a good umbrella that could stand up to both. This  travel umbrella is nice.  It has a rubberized grip.  Is very easy to open and close.  It also comes with a pouch for easy and compact storage when not in use. Velcro holds the umbrella closed when not in use and makes it easier to get umbrella in its pouch.  By just pressing the button and the umbrella open.  This umbrella is compact in size making it perfect for traveling.  The umbrella feels sturdy and keeps the rain out. I haven't tried it in extremely winds but in 20-30 mph gusts it held up great.Pros:Nice lookingCompact for storagehandles wind and rain very wellCons:Can be a little difficult to get in its pouch at times.I received the product for free.  But my opinions are my own  .

Name: Good quality and small enough for a glove box!
Author: R. Hopkins
Review Text: Good quality and small enough for a glove box! I love this little umbrella! I received it as a promotion and I think it is well worth what is charged for it. Most small umbrella's are cheaply made and very flimsy but not this one. Excellent build quality and quite sturdy, I really like this product and would definately recommend it to anyone who needs a compact umbrella for a glove box or lunch box or gym locker. I like it and so will you. nuff said!

Name: What an amazing umbrella! It's compact
Author: Keith W.
Review Text: What an amazing umbrella! It's compact, easy to use and easy to store. The ease of opening it up is convenient. This umbrella does not disappoint. I look forward to seeing it in use. I gave it to my wife as a gift for Christmas to replace a broken one. She is very pleased with it, however, now that she has a good umbrella, it has yet to rain!  Since I haven't bought an umbrella in years, I chose this one based on everyone's reviews and the companies reviews. I appreciate the customer service following up with me from ordering to delivery to ensure my purchase went well. Thank you!

Name: Great customer service from Upper Echelon Products
Author: Alan (.
Review Text: Great customer service from Upper Echelon Products. I was glad that they contacted me to see if I was happy with this umbrella and took it upon themselves to initiate a replacement process when I mentioned a problem with it. I will definitely be buying from them again in the future.The Umbrella itself is a good solid product which looks like it should last a lot longer than the cheapy umbrellas I tend to go through a few times a year. I really like its auto-open/close feature although I wish the button were a little less sensitive. Reasonably small and light enough for travel but big enough to cover one person very well or two people moderately well.

Name: This umbrella has a nice gripped handle and thick metal spokes to hold the ...
Author: Marin Barker
Review Text: Buying umbrellas has become a pain in the butt because they bend, break, tear, or jam right after I buy them. However this umbrella is an exception! This umbrella has a nice gripped handle and thick metal spokes to hold the umbrella out. The fabric is nice and durable so I feel it's not going to tear easily. It's spring loaded to open it and also to close it which is my favorite part. Putting it away is super easy. The only complaint I may have is it is a little heavy for my liking. But over all I am very satisfied with this umbrella and would recommend it to anyone. I also have to state that I received this for free.

Name: This Repel brand looks good, but is it really
Author: John Love
Review Text: I am just so blasted skittish about an umbrella.Totes USED TO BE the only brand to buy.I returned THREE of them in one year -- one broke, another refused to stay fully open and the 3rd's metal expansion structure RUSTED.I'm fed up with the returns. This Repel brand looks good, but is it really?I would love to try it for 3-6 months and really see for myself.jolove3@me.com

Name: but I already LOVE it. It is so much sturdier than other ...
Author: Gale K. Criswell
Review Text: I bought this umbrella for a trip to Thailand in the rainy season.  I haven't used it yet, but I already LOVE it.  It is so much sturdier than other travel umbrellas that I have purchased.  It opens and closes very easily.  Umbrella is nice and big (but not too big).  The handle is about 20 inches long, so it is easy to hang onto.

Name: ... my honest opinion and by saying that I would love to tell you about this amazing product
Author: Carramrod
Review Text: I was lucky enough to be able to get this product for free for a review of my honest opinion and by saying that I would love to tell you about this amazing product.  I really needed a small umbrella for my son for when he's at the bus stop! This is the perfect size for any little one and it is also very easy for him to open and close the umbrella all by himself! I love this product!

Name: My wife recently purchased one of these using the Prime ...
Author: J. Zangari
Review Text: My wife recently purchased one of these using the Prime linked to our household and we took it to Disney. I opened it at the start of some drizzle in the Animal Kingdom and no sooner than that did one of the ends of the ribs become unstitched from the sheet and pull up. Could be a manufacturing one off, or could be indicative of quality. We'll see how they respond here.The mechanism itself seems strong, as do the ribs, but the shaft still feels weak.

Name: Great product backed by great customer service
Author: Michael
Review Text: The Repel Travel Umbrella is awesome. I love how just a touch of a button springs the umbrella open and another closes it just as easily. I‰Ûªm extremely happy with how the umbrella holds up in the very windy city of Boston. It has never inverted like many of my other umbrellas and I know I can count on it to keep me dry.Unfortunately, the closing mechanism got temperamental after about a week, and it took a little extra fiddling to fully close the umbrella. However, Joe from Upper Echelon Products reached out to me a few weeks after my order to check in and see how I liked their product. I told them about the minor inconvienience caused by the button and he was nice enough to send me a replacement umbrella, free of charge, without the need to send back the original! Not only do they sell a fantastic product, Upper Echelon has some great customer service!

Name: i opened and closed this umbrella like 5 times as soon as it arrived (outside of ...
Author: Krista Steuben
Review Text: not gonna lie, i opened and closed this umbrella like 5 times as soon as it arrived (outside of course, very superstitious). it is sooo satisfying, like an old timey switchblade, or a zippo lighter... i never thought that opening an umbrella would feel so cool. best of all, it came in a day or two so after i lost my last cheapo umbrella, i was immediately upgraded before the storm past and it has served me well. it handled the rain (obviously) but more importantly, the WIND, where a lesser umbrella would have surely failed. bonus; the olive drab color is manly, yet refined and doesn't get confused with other all black umbrellas. VERY happy with my purchase.

Name: Super durable!
Author: Zach
Review Text: It was kind of weird how this worked out...My company provided me this crappy umbrella that ripped so I decided to get a good one. I'm not disappointed.I was even given the opportunity to test it like almost after I got it. This thing is really easy to use and super durable. It kept me bone dry and I doubt I'll have the issue that I had with the work one.It's hard to get excited about an umbrella, but to be honest I'm kind of hoping it rains again soon so I get to use it.

Name: awesome umbrellas for traveling and everyday use
Author: Helena
Review Text: I purchased two of these umbrellas after my other umbrellas broke because it was so windy. Most of the umbrellas I have purchased have either broke on one of the spokes or handle or the material wore away and the umbrellas had holes.These guys are much more hardier and have not flipped yet. Looks and feels well made. The spokes are covered by the material and do not slip off. The warranty is an added plus. Pretty sure these umbrellas will last for a much longer time if not forever. Definitely would buy these again.

Name: Teflon Umbrella
Author: Becca
Review Text: This umbrella is great...completely water resistant....water rolls off like on a ducks back....It's perfect size for one person and them carrying a few things....It's strong, steady, and windproof...stays put in your hand...The handle raises with push of button....& push once more, it closes....I received it for completely Free....

Name: The insane thing about this umbrella is the fact that it dries so fast it's like swim trunks
Author: Brianna Melson
Review Text: I have been waiting to write about this umbrella I'll admit that I did not think it was worth the money and that it would not live up for the hype. However it rained alot During Mathew and we had extreme winds everything. I watched other people's umbrella blow away and I held on to my umbrella tight. The insane thing about this umbrella is the fact that it dries so fast it's like swim trunks. My only grip is the fact that it's kind of small. It's really not the lets cuddle underneath this umbrella as I romantically carry us to the car. It's more like if we squeeze we can make it and sustain a minimal amount of water. However this is pretty much a tank.

Name: Listen to the rhythm of the falling rain.....
Author: Penny L. Pollock
Review Text: Recently received my new Repel umbrella! We have had a rainy summer so far - so already used it many times. I love that it has a pouch and is compact, therefore it is easy to store. I like that it is so easy to open and close. I would suggest reading and following the instructions on opening and closing this umbrella. I recommend  only adults using this umbrella as it has automatic open & close buttons. We had a bit of high winds with the rain and the umbrella held up very well. The handle is rubber and easy to grip! This is very heavy duty and I will continue to use  this for many years. I received this umbrella free of charge for my sincere opinion.

Name: i opened and closed this umbrella like 5 times as soon as it arrived (outside of ...
Author: Devon Hurn
Review Text: not gonna lie, i opened and closed this umbrella like 5 times as soon as it arrived (outside of course, very superstitious). it is sooo satisfying, like an old timey switchblade, or a zippo lighter... i never thought that opening an umbrella would feel so cool. best of all, it came in a day or two so after i lost my last cheapo umbrella, i was immediately upgraded before the storm past and it has served me well. it handled the rain (obviously) but more importantly, the WIND, where a lesser umbrella would have surely failed. bonus; the olive drab color is manly, yet refined and doesn't get confused with other all black umbrellas. VERY happy with my purchase.

Name: Everything good so far.
Author: Stan N.
Review Text: Appears to be well designed & well made and no damage noted upon receipt. Opens and closes one handed as advertised. Have not tested in rain (no rain in my SoCal area) but anticipate no issues.  I'll start with 5 stars on a device like this umbrella and adjust rating if deficiencies are noted during rain storm use.

Name: Awesome umbrella
Author: Eric W. Kolodziej
Review Text: I bought this umbrella based on a recommendation from a friend who has one.  The performance is superb.  Holds up great to the wind, and it truly does repel the rain.  Great buy.  My only improvement would be the case.  Like all umbrellas, it's a pain to get back into the sleeve.  There has to be a better way.  Nonetheless, awesome umbrella.

Name: i opened and closed this umbrella like 5 times as soon as it arrived (outside of ...
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: not gonna lie, i opened and closed this umbrella like 5 times as soon as it arrived (outside of course, very superstitious). it is sooo satisfying, like an old timey switchblade, or a zippo lighter... i never thought that opening an umbrella would feel so cool. best of all, it came in a day or two so after i lost my last cheapo umbrella, i was immediately upgraded before the storm past and it has served me well. it handled the rain (obviously) but more importantly, the WIND, where a lesser umbrella would have surely failed. bonus; the olive drab color is manly, yet refined and doesn't get confused with other all black umbrellas. VERY happy with my purchase.

Name: i opened and closed this umbrella like 5 times as soon as it arrived (outside of ...
Author: Amazon Customer
Review Text: not gonna lie, i opened and closed this umbrella like 5 times as soon as it arrived (outside of course, very superstitious). it is sooo satisfying, like an old timey switchblade, or a zippo lighter... i never thought that opening an umbrella would feel so cool. best of all, it came in a day or two so after i lost my last cheapo umbrella, i was immediately upgraded before the storm past and it has served me well. it handled the rain (obviously) but more importantly, the WIND, where a lesser umbrella would have surely failed. bonus; the olive drab color is manly, yet refined and doesn't get confused with other all black umbrellas. VERY happy with my purchase.

Name: The insane thing about this umbrella is the fact that it dries so fast it's like swim trunks
Author: clemika young
Review Text: I have been waiting to write about this umbrella I'll admit that I did not think it was worth the money and that it would not live up for the hype. However it rained alot During Mathew and we had extreme winds everything. I watched other people's umbrella blow away and I held on to my umbrella tight. The insane thing about this umbrella is the fact that it dries so fast it's like swim trunks. My only grip is the fact that it's kind of small. It's really not the lets cuddle underneath this umbrella as I romantically carry us to the car. It's more like if we squeeze we can make it and sustain a minimal amount of water. However this is pretty much a tank.

Name: Great for on the go~
Author: Gabby black
Review Text: This is a great umbrella ! It came in two days and in a great little case. It opens up alot bigger then i thought when i first got it. I have been keeping it in my diaper bag for emergency.  It feels very sturdy in my hands and i have no worries that the wind will snag it and break it like the ones i have purchased in the past. I did receive this product for free exchange for an honest un biased review. Over all i am very happy with my purchase ~

Name: Great Umbrella for College Students
Author: peoskeewee
Review Text: I purchased two of these umbrellas, one for each of my sons who have just gone off to college.  It rained almost the entire week they were in school.  Both called and thanked me for the great umbrellas.  They said even in the windy rain it kept them dry as they walked to their classes.  Worked as expected and did not get destroyed by the wind.

Name: It's compact enough to fit in my work bag so ...
Author: Todd
Review Text: It's compact enough to fit in my work bag so it's always there when I need it. I haven't had any issues with it, and have been in some treacherous down pours in NYC.

Name: Great, super fast delivery
Author: Mark D. Wilson
Review Text: Great, super fast delivery, great customer service. Umbrella is sturdy and operates smoothly and easily. Very comfortable in the hand. Easy open and close. Very happy with this purchase and with this company - they have excellent follow up.

Name: Great umbrella.
Author: Hang N.
Review Text: Great umbrella... just so happen it was very windy a few days after I received it which gave me a chance to test it out. It held up pretty well. The auto open and close function is a plus for one handed operation.  Would have given 5 stars, but it's a bit heavy for a travel umbrella.

Name: Sturdy little umbrella
Author: Timothy Kite
Review Text: A very nice, sturdy portable umbrella. It can withstand winds around Purdue University without a vent flap, so I'd say that's pretty tough. Also dries really fast. Easily big enough for one person and can keep two dry if you like each other and it's not raining too hard.

Name: 10/10 product & 10/10 customer service!
Author: Katelyn B.
Review Text: I bought this umbrella about a year or so ago. Earlier this week, it broke on me when I went to open it. I logged online to purchase another one (because I loved it that much) and noticed a ‰ÛÏlifetime warranty‰Û on the umbrella. I contacted customer service, received a response SUPER quick, and my new umbrella arrived today. ALL WITHIN 5 days. Very impressive product and company!

Name: Great Customer Service!
Author: Alex
Review Text: These umbrellas are amazing! I had a problem with mine, and Repel customer service couldn't have been better; they promptly sent out a new one free of charge. These umbrellas are great and at a very good price. Overall, I'm a very happy customer. :-)

Name: Difficult to close.
Author: d
Review Text: If you have arthritis or a weak hand/arm do not buy this umbrella. It takes a LOT of strength to collapse it(and be on guard when you open it, it opens with tremendous force so that it almost flies out of your hand). Otherwise, it is a handsome umbrella (in black).

Name: I was fortunate to have Amazon deliver this on a day with ...
Author: M. Aseltine
Review Text: I was fortunate to have Amazon deliver this on a day with thunderstorms so I immediately got some use out of it.  I was pleased that despite heavy rain and wind, the umbrella held strong and didn't flex or bend.  It is slightly hard getting it back down and clicked back into the handle but overall it's pretty good quality, even if I was given a discount for doing the review.  All in all, I'm very pleased with it!

Name: Great little umbrella, would recommend.
